author: Dodie Smith

quote: I'm not out here to win a beauty contest.
author: Kirk Gibson

quote: I think Whitman more than any other poet possessed the gift of revealing to others the beauty of everything around us, the beauty of nature, the beauty of human beings.
author: Ella R. Bloor

quote: I'm not trying to stump anybody... it's the beauty of the language that I'm interested in.
author: Buddy Holly

quote: Suddenly life has new meaning to me, there's beauty up above and things we never take notice of, you wake up suddenly you're in love.
author: Billy Ocean

quote: Beauty is altogether in the eye of the beholder.
author: Lew Wallace

quote: Perfect health, like perfect beauty, is a rare thing and so, it seems, is perfect disease.
author: Peter Latham

quote: The beauty of having short hair is that I actually can wash and style it at home!
author: Meagan Good

quote: The cottage garden most for use designed, Yet not of beauty destitute.
author: Charlotte Smith

quote: You will also allow me to thank the Academy for inviting me to lecture in Stockholm, for its hospitality, and for the opportunity afforded me for admiring the charm of your people and the beauty of your country.
author: Guglielmo Marconi

quote: It's harder, but we're still finding oil in Oklahoma today. The bar has been raised on startup companies, but it can still be done. Every regulation and every rule limits you, but, yes, it can still be done. That's the beauty of living in a free country and having the freedom to have an idea and become an entrepreneur.
author: Harold Hamm

quote: Great designers seldom make great advertising men, because they get overcome by the beauty of the picture - and forget that merchandise must be sold.
author: James Randolph Adams

quote: The beauty of the past belongs to the past.
author: Margaret Bourke-White

quote: It is important to fund young researchers who want to do curiosity-driven research. Curiosity-driven research is a part of life. Some people are curious. They want to learn more about nature and society should help that. It's like art: you can learn more and bring more beauty.
author: Serge Haroche

quote: I have no right to beauty. I had been condemned to masculine ugliness.
author: Renee Vivien

quote: Search for beauty without features, something deeper than any signs.
author: Francesca da Rimini

quote: I have several computer companies. One of them I have a program for wide-format printing. I have a beauty program. So I have several different programs that I own for printing.
author: Jerry Mathers

quote: There are elements of intrinsic beauty in the simplification of a house built on the log cabin idea.
author: Gustav Stickley

quote: First, there is the bare beauty of the logs themselves with their long lines and firm curves. Then there is the open charm felt of the structural features which are not hidden under plaster and ornament, but are clearly revealed, a charm felt in Japanese architecture.
author: Gustav Stickley

quote: There is an abiding beauty which may be appreciated by those who will see things as they are and who will ask for no reward except to see.
author: Vera Brittain

quote: I think love and beauty are what life is all about.
author: John Derek

quote: Beauty is the first test: there is no permanent place in the world for ugly mathematics.
author: Godfrey Harold Hardy

quote: For the greater beauty of the instrument, the balls representing the planets are to be of considerable bigness but so contrived, that they may be taken off at pleasure, and others, much smaller, and fitter for some purposes, put in their places.
author: David Rittenhouse

quote: Literature boils with the madcap careers of writers brought to the edge by the demands of living on their nerves, wringing out their memories and their nightmares to extract meaning, truth, beauty.
author: Herbert Gold

quote: I have a book out called 'The Beauty Equation' and it discusses how off track we have gone in considering beauty.
author: Nigel Barker

quote: Jazz is a very democratic musical form. It comes out of a communal experience. We take our respective instruments and collectively create a thing of beauty.
author: Max Roach

quote: But I fear, my lot being cast in Scotland, that beauty would not be content.
author: Anne Boyd

quote: For most people, we often marvel at the beauty of a sunrise or the magnificence of a full moon, but it is impossible to fathom the magnitude of the universe that surrounds us.
author: Richard H. Baker

quote: Hath the spirit of all beauty Kissed you in the path of duty?
author: Anna Katharine Green

quote: There are two kinds of artists in this world those that work because the spirit is in them, and they cannot be silent if they would, and those that speak from a conscientious desire to make apparent to others the beauty that has awakened their own admiration.
author: Anna Katharine Green

quote: We Orientals find beauty not only in the thing itself but in the pattern of the shadows, the light and darkness which that thing provides.
author: Junichiro Tanizaki

quote: Mathematics are the result of mysterious powers which no one understands, and which the unconscious recognition of beauty must play an important part. Out of an infinity of designs a mathematician chooses one pattern for beauty's sake and pulls it down to earth.
author: Marston Morse

quote: A small house must depend on its grouping with other houses for its beauty, and for the preservation of light air and the maximum of surrounding open space.
author: Clarence Stein

quote: Personality is more important than beauty, but imagination is more important than both of them.
author: Laurette Taylor

quote: You can take no credit for beauty at sixteen. But if you are beautiful at sixty, it will be your own soul's doing.
author: Marie Carmichael Stopes

quote: And queenly is the state she keeps, In beauty's lofty trust secure.
author: William Allen Butler

quote: If beauty isn't genius it usually signals at least a high level of animal cunning.
author: Peter York

quote: I don't know what the secret to longevity as an actress is. It's more than talent and beauty. Maybe it's the audience seeing itself in you.
author: Joan Blondell

quote: The beauty of women was the first expression of my photography.
author: Alberto Korda

quote: What I want to give in the theatre is beauty, that's what I want to give.
author: Dame Edith Evans

quote: I want the Arabic Granada, that which is art, which is all that seems to me beauty and emotion.
author: Isaac Albeniz

quote: The flowers anew, returning seasons bring but beauty faded has no second spring.
author: Ambrose Philips

quote: Those who find beauty in all of nature will find themselves at one with the secrets of life itself.
author: L. Wolfe Gilbert

quote: All the beauty of the world, 'tis but skin deep.
author: Ralph Venning

quote: Beauty is the still birth of suffering, every woman knows that.
author: Emily Prager

quote: I feel by posing for Playboy I've discovered my own sexuality and beauty, and I feel more confident than ever.
author: Heather Kozar

quote: Things turn out best for the people who make the best of the way things turn out.
author: John Wooden

quote: Experience hath shewn, that even under the best forms of government those entrusted with power have, in time, and by slow operations, perverted it into tyranny.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: In any moment of decision, the best thing you can do is the right thing, the next best thing is the wrong thing, and the worst thing you can do is nothing.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: To be nobody but yourself in a world which is doing its best, night and day, to make you everybody else means to fight the hardest battle which any human being can fight and never stop fighting.
author: e. e. cummings

quote: In the practice of tolerance, one's enemy is the best teacher.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: I believe that a simple and unassuming manner of life is best for everyone, best both for the body and the mind.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The best way to find out if you can trust somebody is to trust them.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: The only real failure in life is not to be true to the best one knows.
author: Buddha

quote: You have to accept whatever comes and the only important thing is that you meet it with courage and with the best that you have to give.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: I do the very best I know how - the very best I can and I mean to keep on doing so until the end.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The best road to progress is freedom's road.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: The best way to cheer yourself up is to try to cheer somebody else up.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Learn to say 'no' to the good so you can say 'yes' to the best.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: I have the simplest tastes. I am always satisfied with the best.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: In times of great stress or adversity, it's always best to keep busy, to plow your anger and your energy into something positive.
author: Lee Iacocca

quote: At his best, man is the noblest of all animals separated from law and justice he is the worst.
author: Aristotle

quote: Knowing your own darkness is the best method for dealing with the darknesses of other people.
author: Carl Jung

quote: The best revenge is to be unlike him who performed the injury.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: The best revenge is massive success.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: I am as bad as the worst, but, thank God, I am as good as the best.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: It's a funny thing about life if you refuse to accept anything but the best, you very often get it.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: If you want to go somewhere, it is best to find someone who has already been there.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: The best way to keep one's word is not to give it.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: To give and then not feel that one has given is the very best of all ways of giving.
author: Max Beerbohm

quote: Living well is the best revenge.
author: George Herbert

quote: If a man does his best, what else is there?
author: George S. Patton

quote: Clever men are good, but they are not the best.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: It was the best of times, it was the worst of times.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: I always prefer to believe the best of everybody, it saves so much trouble.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: The best thing to do with the best things in life is to give them up.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: The worst men often give the best advice.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: We are at our very best, and we are happiest, when we are fully engaged in work we enjoy on the journey toward the goal we've established for ourselves. It gives meaning to our time off and comfort to our sleep. It makes everything else in life so wonderful, so worthwhile.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: The best thing about animals is that they don't talk much.
author: Thornton Wilder

quote: I have found the best way to give advice to your children is to find out what they want and then advise them to do it.
author: Harry S. Truman

quote: The best things in life are unexpected - because there were no expectations.
author: Eli Khamarov

quote: I will do my best. That is all I can do. I ask for your help - and God's.
author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: Best to live lightly, unthinkingly.
author: Sophocles

quote: The best doctors in the world are Doctor Diet, Doctor Quiet, and Doctor Merryman.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: To love and win is the best thing. To love and lose, the next best.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: A problem is a chance for you to do your best.
author: Duke Ellington

quote: Whether it's the best of times or the worst of times, it's the only time we've got.
author: Art Buchwald

quote: He who has done his best for his own time has lived for all times.
author: Friedrich Schiller

quote: You'll live. Only the best get killed.
author: Charles de Gaulle

quote: This is the precept by which I have lived: Prepare for the worst expect the best and take what comes.
author: Hannah Arendt

quote: Most of the things we decide are not what we know to be the best. We say yes, merely because we are driven into a corner and must say something.
author: Frank Crane

quote: There is only one real sin and that is to persuade oneself that the second best is anything but second best.
author: Doris Lessing

quote: Nobody who ever gave his best regretted it.
author: George Halas

quote: Since we live in this world, we have to do our best for this world.
author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quote: Enthusiasm is the best protection in any situation. Wholeheartedness is contagious. Give yourself, if you wish to get others.
author: David Seabury

quote: First gain the victory and then make the best use of it you can.
author: Horatio Nelson

quote: The best way to navigate through life is to give up all of our controls.
author: Gerald Jampolsky

quote: When you do not know what you are doing and what you are doing is the best - that is inspiration.
author: Robert Bresson

quote: The creed of a true saint is to make the best of life, and to make the most of it.
author: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

quote: Just do what you do best.
author: Red Auerbach

quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
author: Helen Keller

quote: I believe in pink. I believe that laughing is the best calorie burner. I believe in kissing, kissing a lot. I believe in being strong when everything seems to be going wrong. I believe that happy girls are the prettiest girls. I believe that tomorrow is another day and I believe in miracles.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
author: Buddha

quote: We must develop and maintain the capacity to forgive. He who is devoid of the power to forgive is devoid of the power to love. There is some good in the worst of us and some evil in the best of us. When we discover this, we are less prone to hate our enemies.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: God always gives His best to those who leave the choice with him.
author: Jim Elliot

quote: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
author: Og Mandino

quote: A wise man is superior to any insults which can be put upon him, and the best reply to unseemly behavior is patience and moderation.
author: Moliere

quote: My formula for living is quite simple. I get up in the morning and I go to bed at night. In between, I occupy myself as best I can.
author: Cary Grant

quote: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best.
author: Epictetus

quote: The best argument against democracy is a five-minute conversation with the average voter.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The best thing about the future is that it comes one day at a time.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Sleep is the best meditation.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: The things I want to know are in books my best friend is the man who'll get me a book I ain't read.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: You can't stop loving or wanting to love because when its right it's the best thing in the world. When you're in a relationship and its good, even if nothing else in your life is right, you feel like your whole world is complete.
author: Keith Sweat

quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Government, even in its best state, is but a necessary evil in its worst state, an intolerable one.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: Speak when you are angry and you will make the best speech you will ever regret.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: A leader is best when people barely know he exists, when his work is done, his aim fulfilled, they will say: we did it ourselves.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: I believe God is managing affairs and that He doesn't need any advice from me. With God in charge, I believe everything will work out for the best in the end. So what is there to worry about.
author: Henry Ford

quote: My mama always used to tell me: 'If you can't find somethin' to live for, you best find somethin' to die for.'
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand, and the determination that whether we win or lose, we have applied the best of ourselves to the task at hand.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: My dream is of a place and a time where America will once again be seen as the last best hope of earth.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Common looking people are the best in the world: that is the reason the Lord makes so many of them.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The age of a woman doesn't mean a thing. The best tunes are played on the oldest fiddles.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I am prepared for the worst, but hope for the best.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Our prayers should be for blessings in general, for God knows best what is good for us.
author: Socrates

quote: The best proof of love is trust.
author: Joyce Brothers

quote: All the adversity I've had in my life, all my troubles and obstacles, have strengthened me... You may not realize it when it happens, but a kick in the teeth may be the best thing in the world for you.
author: Walt Disney

quote: For a people who are free, and who mean to remain so, a well-organized and armed militia is their best security.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: One's philosophy is not best expressed in words it is expressed in the choices one makes... and the choices we make are ultimately our responsibility.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: The best way to destroy an enemy is to make him a friend.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The best years of your life are the ones in which you decide your problems are your own. You do not blame them on your mother, the ecology, or the president. You realize that you control your own destiny.
author: Albert Ellis

quote: My best friend is the man who in wishing me well wishes it for my sake.
author: Aristotle

quote: I never had a policy I have just tried to do my very best each and every day.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: If it's your job to eat a frog, it's best to do it first thing in the morning. And If it's your job to eat two frogs, it's best to eat the biggest one first.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Honesty is the best policy.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: I want it said of me by those who knew me best, that I always plucked a thistle and planted a flower where I thought a flower would grow.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Outside of a dog, a book is a man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: In giving freedom to the slave, we assure freedom to the free - honorable alike in what we give and what we preserve. We shall nobly save, or meanly lose, the last best hope of earth.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The best way to get a bad law repealed is to enforce it strictly.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The best way to resolve any problem in the human world is for all sides to sit down and talk.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: When you have got an elephant by the hind legs and he is trying to run away, it's best to let him run.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: We have the best government that money can buy.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The time comes upon every public man when it is best for him to keep his lips closed.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: It is no use saying, 'We are doing our best.' You have got to succeed in doing what is necessary.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: I am easily satisfied with the very best.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The trees that are slow to grow bear the best fruit.
author: Moliere

quote: Honesty is the best policy - when there is money in it.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The best remedy for those who are afraid, lonely or unhappy is to go outside, somewhere where they can be quiet, alone with the heavens, nature and God. Because only then does one feel that all is as it should be.
author: Anne Frank

quote: It is not best that we should all think alike it is a difference of opinion that makes horse races.
author: Mark Twain

quote: If you die you're completely happy and your soul somewhere lives on. I'm not afraid of dying. Total peace after death, becoming someone else is the best hope I've got.
author: Kurt Cobain

quote: The best way out is always through.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Far and away the best prize that life has to offer is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Prosperity is the best protector of principle.
author: Mark Twain

quote: He who knows best knows how little he knows.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: The short words are best, and the old words are the best of all.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Broadly speaking, the short words are the best, and the old words best of all.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Sometimes when you innovate, you make mistakes. It is best to admit them quickly, and get on with improving your other innovations.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: In war as in life, it is often necessary when some cherished scheme has failed, to take up the best alternative open, and if so, it is folly not to work for it with all your might.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Short words are best and the old words when short are best of all.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Education is the best friend. An educated person is respected everywhere. Education beats the beauty and the youth.
author: Chanakya

quote: Walking is the best possible exercise. Habituate yourself to walk very fast.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Battle is the most magnificent competition in which a human being can indulge. It brings out all that is best it removes all that is base. All men are afraid in battle. The coward is the one who lets his fear overcome his sense of duty. Duty is the essence of manhood.
author: George S. Patton

quote: If I'm honest I have to tell you I still read fairy-tales and I like them best of all.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: No one wants to die. Even people who want to go to heaven don't want to die to get there. And yet death is the destination we all share. No one has ever escaped it. And that is as it should be, because Death is very likely the single best invention of Life. It is Life's change agent. It clears out the old to make way for the new.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Laughter is not at all a bad beginning for a friendship, and it is far the best ending for one.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: When we do the best that we can, we never know what miracle is wrought in our life, or in the life of another.
author: Helen Keller

quote: The best smell in the world is that man that you love.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: The best minds are not in government. If any were, business would steal them away.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: To wear your heart on your sleeve isn't a very good plan you should wear it inside, where it functions best.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: But men are men the best sometimes forget.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Surround yourself with the best people you can find, delegate authority, and don't interfere as long as the policy you've decided upon is being carried out.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me.
author: Henry Ford

quote: If you have a positive attitude and constantly strive to give your best effort, eventually you will overcome your immediate problems and find you are ready for greater challenges.
author: Pat Riley

quote: Infinite striving to be the best is man's duty it is its own reward. Everything else is in God's hands.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: My experience has been that work is almost the best way to pull oneself out of the depths.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: I can not believe that war is the best solution. No one won the last war, and no one will win the next war.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Success is peace of mind which is a direct result of self-satisfaction in knowing you did your best to become the best you are capable of becoming.
author: John Wooden

quote: 'Tis best to weigh the enemy more mighty than he seems.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: If you can't get rid of the skeleton in your closet, you'd best teach it to dance.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Perhaps nature is our best assurance of immortality.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Perhaps I know best why it is man alone who laughs he alone suffers so deeply that he had to invent laughter.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: When the best leader's work is done the people say, 'We did it ourselves.'
author: Lao Tzu

quote: The boundaries which divide Life from Death are at best shadowy and vague. Who shall say where the one ends, and where the other begins?
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: Why don't you start believing that no matter what you have or haven't done, that your best days are still out in front of you.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Expect the best. Prepare for the worst. Capitalize on what comes.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Personally, I just think rap music is the best thing out there, period. If you look at my deck in my car radio, you're always going to find a hip-hop tape that's all I buy, that's all I live, that's all I listen to, that's all I love.
author: Eminem

quote: The best weapon against an enemy is another enemy.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: You are capable of more than you know. Choose a goal that seems right for you and strive to be the best, however hard the path. Aim high. Behave honorably. Prepare to be alone at times, and to endure failure. Persist! The world needs all you can give.
author: E. O. Wilson

quote: We have the power to make this the best generation of mankind in the history of the world or to make it the last.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: If liberty and equality, as is thought by some, are chiefly to be found in democracy, they will be best attained when all persons alike share in government to the utmost.
author: Aristotle

quote: What we have found in this country, and maybe we're more aware of it now, is one problem that we've had, even in the best of times, and that is the people who are sleeping on the grates, the homeless, you might say, by choice.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: An archaeologist is the best husband a woman can have. The older she gets the more interested he is in her.
author: Agatha Christie

quote: A man is relieved and gay when he has put his heart into his work and done his best but what he has said or done otherwise shall give him no peace.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Those who govern, having much business on their hands, do not generally like to take the trouble of considering and carrying into execution new projects. The best public measures are therefore seldom adopted from previous wisdom, but forced by the occasion.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Hunger is the best pickle.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The ideal man bears the accidents of life with dignity and grace, making the best of circumstances.
author: Aristotle

quote: It might be said now that I have the best of both worlds. A Harvard education and a Yale degree.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: A blessed thing it is for any man or woman to have a friend, one human soul whom we can trust utterly, who knows the best and worst of us, and who loves us in spite of all our faults.
author: Charles Kingsley

quote: A good character is the best tombstone. Those who loved you and were helped by you will remember you when forget-me-nots have withered. Carve your name on hearts, not on marble.
author: Charles Spurgeon

quote: Fatigue is the best pillow.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: That government is best which governs least.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to give the best to those who dream and work.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: To give anything less than your best, is to sacrifice the gift.
author: Steve Prefontaine

quote: 'Thank you' is the best prayer that anyone could say. I say that one a lot. Thank you expresses extreme gratitude, humility, understanding.
author: Alice Walker

quote: Success comes from knowing that you did your best to become the best that you are capable of becoming.
author: John Wooden

quote: The fox has many tricks. The hedgehog has but one. But that is the best of all.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Our best thoughts come from others.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: It is best to rise from life as from a banquet, neither thirsty nor drunken.
author: Aristotle

quote: The best friend is the man who in wishing me well wishes it for my sake.
author: Aristotle

quote: The best effort of a fine person is felt after we have left their presence.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose. You are already naked. There is no reason not to follow your heart.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The best thing one can do when it's raining is to let it rain.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: I feel sorry for people who don't drink. They wake up in the morning and that's the best they're going to feel all day.
author: Dean Martin

quote: Education is the best provision for old age.
author: Aristotle

quote: The best cure for insomnia is to get a lot of sleep.
author: W. C. Fields

quote: The man who makes everything that leads to happiness depends upon himself, and not upon other men, has adopted the very best plan for living happily. This is the man of moderation, the man of manly character and of wisdom.
author: Plato

quote: Those who excel in virtue have the best right of all to rebel, but then they are of all men the least inclined to do so.
author: Aristotle

quote: To know yet to think that one does not know is best Not to know yet to think that one knows will lead to difficulty.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: We have an obligation and a responsibility to be investing in our students and our schools. We must make sure that people who have the grades, the desire and the will, but not the money, can still get the best education possible.
author: Barack Obama

quote: But the person who scored well on an SAT will not necessarily be the best doctor or the best lawyer or the best businessman. These tests do not measure character, leadership, creativity, perseverance.
author: William Julius Wilson

quote: There is one rule for the industrialist and that is: Make the best quality of goods possible at the lowest cost possible, paying the highest wages possible.
author: Henry Ford

quote: The best preparation for good work tomorrow is to do good work today.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: The best evaluation I can make of a player is to look in his eyes and see how scared they are.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: I want to be perceived as a guy who played his best in all facets, not just scoring. A guy who loved challenges.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Age appears to be best in four things old wood best to burn, old wine to drink, old friends to trust, and old authors to read.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: The ladder of success is best climbed by stepping on the rungs of opportunity.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: One of the best things that ever happened to me is that I'm a woman. That is the way all females should feel.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: A woman knows by intuition, or instinct, what is best for herself.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: I've always felt toward the slightest scene, even if all I had to do in a scene was just to come in and say, 'Hi,' that the people ought to get their money's worth and that this is an obligation of mine, to give them the best you can get from me.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: I'm selfish, impatient, and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I'm out of control, and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Good humor is a tonic for mind and body. It is the best antidote for anxiety and depression. It is a business asset. It attracts and keeps friends. It lightens human burdens. It is the direct route to serenity and contentment.
author: Grenville Kleiser

quote: He who laughs best today, will also laughs last.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Treat your kid like a darling for the first five years. For the next five years, scold them. By the time they turn sixteen, treat them like a friend. Your grown up children are your best friends.
author: Chanakya

quote: But what we can do, as flawed as we are, is still see God in other people, and do our best to help them find their own grace. That's what I strive to do, that's what I pray to do every day.
author: Barack Obama

quote: You're not going to say anything about me that I'm not going to say about myself. There's so many things that I think about myself if someone really wanted to get at me, they could say this and this and this. So I'm going to say it before they can. It's the best policy for me.
author: Eminem

quote: My husband and I are best of friends first and foremost. We fight like cats and dogs, but never stay mad for long. I was lucky to find him, he is in every way, my soulmate.
author: Carnie Wilson

quote: In the last analysis, even the best man is evil: in the last analysis, even the best woman is bad.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The best author will be the one who is ashamed to become a writer.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: After all manner of professors have done their best for us, the place we are to get knowledge is in books. The true university of these days is a collection of books.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Happiness does not come from doing easy work but from the afterglow of satisfaction that comes after the achievement of a difficult task that demanded our best.
author: Theodore Isaac Rubin

quote: Read the best books first, or you may not have a chance to read them at all.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Honestly, I'd love to be remembered as one of the best to ever pick up a mic, but if I'm doing my part to lessen some racial tension I feel good about what I'm doing.
author: Eminem

quote: The best executive is one who has sense enough to pick good people to do what he wants done, and self-restraint enough to keep from meddling with them while they do it.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: As you become more clear about who you really are, you'll be better able to decide what is best for you - the first time around.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The best place to find God is in a garden. You can dig for him there.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: The best things and best people rise out of their separateness I'm against a homogenized society because I want the cream to rise.
author: Robert Frost

quote: So much of what is best in us is bound up in our love of family, that it remains the measure of our stability because it measures our sense of loyalty. All other pacts of love or fear derive from it and are modeled upon it.
author: Haniel Long

quote: I've always taught that a poor economy is the best opportunity for salespeople because the naysayers and grumblers have already given up, leaving more territory, more opportunities to be successful than in a good economy when virtually all salespeople are out there, giving it their best.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: I did not wish to take a cabin passage, but rather to go before the mast and on the deck of the world, for there I could best see the moonlight amid the mountains. I do not wish to go below now.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I am afraid we must make the world honest before we can honestly say to our children that honesty is the best policy.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: The language of excitement is at best picturesque merely. You must be calm before you can utter oracles.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Best way to get rid of kitchen odors: Eat out.
author: Phyllis Diller

quote: It is best to avoid the beginnings of evil.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I didn't see it then, but it turned out that getting fired from Apple was the best thing that could have ever happened to me. The heaviness of being successful was replaced by the lightness of being a beginner again, less sure about everything. It freed me to enter one of the most creative periods of my life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Nothing goes by luck in composition. It allows of no tricks. The best you can write will be the best you are.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: One way or another, we all have to find what best fosters the flowering of our humanity in this contemporary life, and dedicate ourselves to that.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: The man with the best job in the country is the vice-president. All he has to do is get up every morning and say, 'How is the president?'
author: Will Rogers

quote: Being good in business is the most fascinating kind of art. Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: I am just absolutely convinced that the best formula for giving us peace and preserving the American way of life is freedom, limited government, and minding our own business overseas.
author: Ron Paul

quote: You are a product of your environment. So choose the environment that will best develop you toward your objective. Analyze your life in terms of its environment. Are the things around you helping you toward success - or are they holding you back?
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: Experience taught me a few things. One is to listen to your gut, no matter how good something sounds on paper. The second is that you're generally better off sticking with what you know. And the third is that sometimes your best investments are the ones you don't make.
author: Donald Trump

quote: It is literally true that you can succeed best and quickest by helping others to succeed.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: I always believe that to be the best, you have to smell like the best, dress like the best, act like the best. When you throw your trash in the garbage can, it has to be better than anybody else who ever threw trash in the garbage can.
author: Lil Wayne

quote: I think it's brought the world a lot closer together, and will continue to do that. There are downsides to everything there are unintended consequences to everything. The most corrosive piece of technology that I've ever seen is called television - but then, again, television, at its best, is magnificent.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Do the best you can, and don't take life too serious.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Remember, always give your best. Never get discouraged. Never be petty. Always remember, others may hate you. But those who hate you don't win unless you hate them. And then you destroy yourself.
author: Richard M. Nixon

quote: The pursuit, even of the best things, ought to be calm and tranquil.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: You may not realize it when it happens, but a kick in the teeth may be the best thing in the world for you.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Life is about not knowing, having to change, taking the moment and making the best of it, without knowing what's going to happen next.
author: Gilda Radner

quote: The worst thing that happens to you may be the best thing for you if you don't let it get the best of you.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Don't be afraid to give your best to what seemingly are small jobs. Every time you conquer one it makes you that much stronger. If you do the little jobs well, the big ones will tend to take care of themselves.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: The best way to hold a man is in your arms.
author: Mae West

quote: Society in every state is a blessing, but government, even in its best stage, is but a necessary evil in its worst state an intolerable one.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: It is difficult to make our material condition better by the best law, but it is easy enough to ruin it by bad laws.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Our goal is to make the best devices in the world, not to be the biggest.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: If you're doing your best, you won't have any time to worry about failure.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Civilization had too many rules for me, so I did my best to rewrite them.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: A failure is not always a mistake, it may simply be the best one can do under the circumstances. The real mistake is to stop trying.
author: B. F. Skinner

quote: To help yourself, you must be yourself. Be the best that you can be. When you make a mistake, learn from it, pick yourself up and move on.
author: Dave Pelzer

quote: We think the Mac will sell zillions, but we didn't build the Mac for anybody else. We built it for ourselves. We were the group of people who were going to judge whether it was great or not. We weren't going to go out and do market research. We just wanted to build the best thing we could build.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: If you believe in what you are doing, then let nothing hold you up in your work. Much of the best work of the world has been done against seeming impossibilities. The thing is to get the work done.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: I know my country has not perfected itself. At times, we've struggled to keep the promise of liberty and equality for all of our people. We've made our share of mistakes, and there are times when our actions around the world have not lived up to our best intentions.
author: Barack Obama

quote: So let's not use a stylus. We're going to use the best pointing device in the world. We're going to use a pointing device that we're all born with - born with ten of them. We're going to use our fingers. We're going to touch this with our fingers. And we have invented a new technology called multi-touch, which is phenomenal. It works like magic.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: We hire people who want to make the best things in the world.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Dad needs to show an incredible amount of respect and humor and friendship toward his mate so the kids understand their parents are sexy, they're fun, they do things together, they're best friends. Kids learn by example. If I respect Mom, they're going to respect Mom.
author: Tim Allen

quote: Don't lower your expectations to meet your performance. Raise your level of performance to meet your expectations. Expect the best of yourself, and then do what is necessary to make it a reality.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: A national political campaign is better than the best circus ever heard of, with a mass baptism and a couple of hangings thrown in.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: The best liar is he who makes the smallest amount of lying go the longest way.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: Doing the best at this moment puts you in the best place for the next moment.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: We are all travelers in the wilderness of this world, and the best we can find in our travels is an honest friend.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: My philosophy is that not only are you responsible for your life, but doing the best at this moment puts you I the best place for the next moment.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: An educated person is one who has learned that information almost always turns out to be at best incomplete and very often false, misleading, fictitious, mendacious - just dead wrong.
author: Russell Baker

quote: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.
author: Paul Valery

quote: In fact, the best thing we could do on taxes for all Americans is to simplify the individual tax code. This will be a tough job, but members of both parties have expressed an interest in doing this, and I am prepared to join them.
author: Barack Obama

quote: Look your best - who said love is blind?
author: Mae West

quote: Success in its highest and noblest form calls for peace of mind and enjoyment and happiness which come only to the man who has found the work that he likes best.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: I just think it is important that you realize , that you're the best in the world. Whether you are a Democrat or Republican or whether you're libertarian or whatever, you are the best. And we should not ever forget that. And when somebody does not do the job, we got to let them go.
author: Clint Eastwood

quote: The best way out of a difficulty is through it.
author: Will Rogers

quote: We can choose a future where we export more products and outsource fewer jobs. After a decade that was defined by what we bought and borrowed, we're getting back to basics, and doing what America has always done best: We're making things again.
author: Barack Obama

quote: Success is peace of mind, which is a direct result of self-satisfaction in knowing you made the effort to become the best of which you are capable.
author: John Wooden

quote: My aim is to put down on paper what I see and what I feel in the best and simplest way.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Excellence is the best deterrent to racism or sexism.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: There's a victory, and defeat the first and best of victories, the lowest and worst of defeats which each man gains or sustains at the hands not of another, but of himself.
author: Plato

quote: The best way to pay for a lovely moment is to enjoy it.
author: Richard Bach

quote: A man's friendships are one of the best measures of his worth.
author: Charles Darwin

quote: In the practical art of war, the best thing of all is to take the enemy's country whole and intact to shatter and destroy it is not so good.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: Cynical realism is the intelligent man's best excuse for doing nothing in an intolerable situation.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: When a place gets crowded enough to require ID's, social collapse is not far away. It is time to go elsewhere. The best thing about space travel is that it made it possible to go elsewhere.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: For a long time now I have tried simply to write the best I can. Sometimes I have good luck and write better than I can.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Life doesn't require that we be the best, only that we try our best.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: God is not on the side of the big battalions, but on the side of those who shoot best.
author: Voltaire

quote: Never argue at the dinner table, for the one who is not hungry always gets the best of the argument.
author: Voltaire

quote: It has always been my belief that a man should do his best, regardless of how much he receives for his services, or the number of people he may be serving or the class of people served.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: I was raised to believe that excellence is the best deterrent to racism or sexism. And that's how I operate my life.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Compromise is the best and cheapest lawyer.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Your purpose is to make your audience see what you saw, hear what you heard, feel what you felt. Relevant detail, couched in concrete, colorful language, is the best way to recreate the incident as it happened and to picture it for the audience.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: The best way to sell yourself to others is first to sell the others to yourself.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: A large income is the best recipe for happiness I ever heard of.
author: Jane Austen

quote: One thing is sure. We have to do something. We have to do the best we know how at the moment... If it doesn't turn out right, we can modify it as we go along.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: The statistics on sanity are that one out of every four Americans is suffering from some form of mental illness. Think of your three best friends. If they're okay, then it's you.
author: Rita Mae Brown

quote: That is what we are supposed to do when we are at our best - make it all up - but make it up so truly that later it will happen that way.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: The best is the enemy of the good.
author: Voltaire

quote: Marilyn Monroe wasn't even her real name, Charles Manson isn't his real name, and now, I'm taking that to be my real name. But what's real? You can't find the truth, you just pick the lie you like the best.
author: Marilyn Manson

quote: The optimist thinks this is the best of all possible worlds. The pessimist fears it is true.
author: J. Robert Oppenheimer

quote: The best activities for your health are pumping and humping.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: In this world you've just got to hope for the best and prepare for the worst and take whatever God sends.
author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quote: The best government is a benevolent tyranny tempered by an occasional assassination.
author: Voltaire

quote: Everyone enjoys doing the kind of work for which he is best suited.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: In a completely rational society, the best of us would be teachers and the rest of us would have to settle for something else.
author: Lee Iacocca

quote: All significant truths are private truths. As they become public they cease to become truths they become facts, or at best, part of the public character or at worst, catchwords.
author: T. S. Eliot

quote: The best way to be boring is to leave nothing out.
author: Voltaire

quote: We would all like to vote for the best man but he is never a candidate.
author: Kin Hubbard

quote: Our best successes often come after our greatest disappointments.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: And while the law of competition may be sometimes hard for the individual, it is best for the race, because it ensures the survival of the fittest in every department.
author: Andrew Carnegie

quote: Don't let the fear of the time it will take to accomplish something stand in the way of your doing it. The time will pass anyway we might just as well put that passing time to the best possible use.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: Do right. Do your best. Treat others as you want to be treated.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: Among the natural rights of the colonists are these: First a right to life, secondly to liberty, and thirdly to property together with the right to defend them in the best manner they can.
author: Samuel Adams

quote: The best government is that which teaches us to govern ourselves.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Just do the best you can. No one can do more than that.
author: John Wooden

quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: The death of my father is probably the biggest thing that I ever faced. Daddy and I were best friends.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: The genius of the United States is not best or most in its executives or legislatures, nor in its ambassadors or authors or colleges, or churches, or parlors, nor even in its newspapers or inventors, but always most in the common people.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: The best scientist is open to experience and begins with romance - the idea that anything is possible.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: Our worldly successes cannot be guaranteed, but our ability to achieve spiritual success is entirely up to us, thanks to the grace of God. The best advice I know is to give is to give those worldly things your best but never your all - reserve the ultimate hope for the only one who can grant it.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
author: Alan Kay

quote: Which government is the best? The one that teaches us to govern ourselves.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: About astrology and palmistry: they are good because they make people vivid and full of possibilities. They are communism at its best. Everybody has a birthday and almost everybody has a palm.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: Luck marches with those who give their very best.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: I find that the best way to do things is to constantly move forward and to never doubt anything and keep moving forward, if you make a mistake say you made a mistake.
author: John Frusciante

quote: In art the best is good enough.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: One cannot develop taste from what is of average quality but only from the very best.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: The best cure for the body is a quiet mind.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: The only way to get the best of an argument is to avoid it.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Best of all is it to preserve everything in a pure, still heart, and let there be for every pulse a thanksgiving, and for every breath a song.
author: Konrad von Gesner

quote: You teach best what you most need to learn.
author: Richard Bach

quote: It is always the best policy to speak the truth, unless, of course, you are an exceptionally good liar.
author: Jerome K. Jerome

quote: To refrain from imitation is the best revenge.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Yes'm, old friends is always best, 'less you can catch a new one that's fit to make an old one out of.
author: Sarah Orne Jewett

quote: The best lack all conviction, while the worst are full of passionate intensity.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: There is an infinite difference between a little wrong and just right, between fairly good and the best, between mediocrity and superiority.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: I just want to do what I do best, and that's fight. I love it.
author: Mike Tyson

quote: No one can really honestly be the very best, no one.
author: John Wooden

quote: Some of my best leading men have been dogs and horses.
author: Elizabeth Taylor

quote: You must accept that you might fail then, if you do your best and still don't win, at least you can be satisfied that you've tried. If you don't accept failure as a possibility, you don't set high goals, you don't branch out, you don't try - you don't take the risk.
author: Rosalynn Carter

quote: You always want to quit while you are ahead. You don't want to be like a fighter who stays too long in the ring until you're not performing at your best.
author: Clint Eastwood

quote: To be successful in real estate, you must always and consistently put your clients' best interests first. When you do, your personal needs will be realized beyond your greatest expectations.
author: Anthony Hitt

quote: Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: The 1st period is won by the best technician. The 2nd period is won by the kid in the best shape. The 3rd period is won by the kid with the biggest heart.
author: Dan Gable

quote: There's a lot of great movies that have won the Academy Award, and a lot of great movies that haven't. You just do the best you can.
author: Clint Eastwood

quote: I believe the best service to the child is the service closest to the child, and children who are victims of neglect, abuse, or abandonment must not also be victims of bureaucracy. They deserve our devoted attention, not our divided attention.
author: Kenny Guinn

quote: The trite saying that honesty is the best policy has met with the just criticism that honesty is not policy. The real honest man is honest from conviction of what is right, not from policy.
author: Robert E. Lee

quote: We must stop thinking of the individual and start thinking about what is best for society.
author: Hillary Clinton

quote: If you felt that excitement when you voted for Barack Obama, shouldn't you feel that way now that he's President Obama? You know there's something wrong with the kind of job he's done as president when the best feeling you had was the day you voted for him.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: The best thinking has been done in solitude. The worst has been done in turmoil.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: To study the abnormal is the best way of understanding the normal.
author: William James

quote: A well regulated militia, composed of the body of the people, trained in arms, is the best most natural defense of a free country.
author: James Madison

quote: Make the best use of what is in your power, and take the rest as it happens.
author: Epictetus

quote: Massachusetts children cannot only lead the nation in test scores, they can be competitive with the best in the world. And the gap in achievement among races can virtually disappear.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: I want you to remember when our White House reflected the best of who we are, not the worst of what Europe has become.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: The strength and power and goodness of America has always been based on the strength and power and goodness of our communities, our families, our faiths. That is the bedrock of what makes America, America. In our best days, we can feel the vibrancy of America's communities, large and small.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: I have long since come to believe that people never mean half of what they say, and that it is best to disregard their talk and judge only their actions.
author: Dorothy Day

quote: Nearly all the best things that came to me in life have been unexpected, unplanned by me.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: The best way to destroy the capitalist system is to debauch the currency.
author: Vladimir Lenin

quote: Achievement is not always success, while reputed failure often is. It is honest endeavor, persistent effort to do the best possible under any and all circumstances.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: Baseball was, is and always will be to me the best game in the world.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: The things we know best are the things we haven't been taught.
author: Luc de Clapiers

quote: Surround yourself with good people. Whether they're the best or not, people are capable of learning if they've got good hearts and they're good souls.
author: Kid Rock

quote: Always Do Your Best. Your best is going to change from moment to moment it will be different when you are healthy as opposed to sick. Under any circumstance, simply do your best, and you will avoid self-judgment, self-abuse and regret.
author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

quote: Cheerfulness is the best promoter of health and is as friendly to the mind as to the body.
author: Joseph Addison

quote: The best weapon of a dictatorship is secrecy, but the best weapon of a democracy should be the weapon of openness.
author: Niels Bohr

quote: I think what makes our marriage work amid all the glare is that my husband is my best friend. He inspires everything in my life and enables me to do the best that I can. I want to hang out with him more than anyone.
author: Faith Hill

quote: Now I see the secret of making the best person: it is to grow in the open air and to eat and sleep with the earth.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Laughter is not a bad beginning for a friendship, and it is the best ending for one.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: What we call wisdom is the result of all the wisdom of past ages. Our best institutions are like young trees growing upon the roots of the old trunks that have crumbled away.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: The best way of removing negativity is to laugh and be joyous.
author: David Icke

quote: Every year of my life I grow more convinced that it is wisest and best to fix our attention on the beautiful and the good, and dwell as little as possible on the evil and the false.
author: Richard Cecil

quote: Men are like wine - some turn to vinegar, but the best improve with age.
author: Pope John XXIII

quote: I owe my success to having listened respectfully to the very best advice, and then going away and doing the exact opposite.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: With my wife I don't get no respect. I made a toast on her birthday to 'the best woman a man ever had.' The waiter joined me.
author: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: The best and safest thing is to keep a balance in your life, acknowledge the great powers around us and in us. If you can do that, and live that way, you are really a wise man.
author: Euripides

quote: The Lord gets his best soldiers out of the highlands of affliction.
author: Charles Spurgeon

quote: The best argument I know for an immortal life is the existence of a man who deserves one.
author: William James

quote: Set up another case bartender! The best thing for a case of nerves is a case of Scotch.
author: W. C. Fields

quote: Toleration is the best religion.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Speak when you are angry - and you'll make the best speech you'll ever regret.
author: Laurence J. Peter

quote: Stubborn and ardent clinging to one's opinion is the best proof of stupidity.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: The best books... are those that tell you what you know already.
author: George Orwell

quote: Genius always gives its best at first prudence, at last.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Do what you love to do and give it your very best. Whether it's business or baseball, or the theater, or any field. If you don't love what you're doing and you can't give it your best, get out of it. Life is too short. You'll be an old man before you know it.
author: Al Lopez

quote: That best portion of a man's life, his little, nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and love.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: I lead no party I follow no leader. I have given the best part of my life to careful study of Islam, its law and polity, its culture, its history and its literature.
author: Muhammad Iqbal

quote: I don't want to do business with those who don't make a profit, because they can't give the best service.
author: Richard Bach

quote: No man who worships education has got the best out of education... Without a gentle contempt for education no man's education is complete.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Use what talents you possess the woods would be very silent if no birds sang there except those that sang best.
author: Henry Van Dyke

quote: A woman's best protection is a little money of her own.
author: Clare Boothe Luce

quote: People who lean on logic and philosophy and rational exposition end by starving the best part of the mind.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: The most basic question is not what is best, but who shall decide what is best.
author: Thomas Sowell

quote: I don't know why, it's the same reason why you like some music and you don't like others. There's something about it that you like. Ultimately I don't find it's in my best interests to try and analyze it, since it's fundamentally emotional.
author: Jerry Garcia

quote: I am not a perfect servant. I am a public servant doing my best against the odds. As I develop and serve, be patient. God is not finished with me yet.
author: Jesse Jackson

quote: Of all the home remedies, a good wife is best.
author: Kin Hubbard

quote: Everywhere I go, I'm asked if I think the universities stifle writers. My opinion is that they don't stifle enough of them. There's many a best seller that could have been prevented by a good teacher.
author: Flannery O'Connor

quote: These things bring you to reality as to how fragile you are at the same moment you are doing something that nobody else is able to do. The same moment that you are seen as the best, the fastest and somebody that cannot be touched, you are enormously fragile.
author: Ayrton Senna

quote: I was never one to patiently pick up broken fragments and glue them together again and tell myself that the mended whole was as good as new. What is broken is broken - and I'd rather remember it as it was at its best than mend it and see the broken places as long as I lived.
author: Margaret Mitchell

quote: Goals provide the energy source that powers our lives. One of the best ways we can get the most from the energy we have is to focus it. That is what goals can do for us concentrate our energy.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: The deferring of anger is the best antidote to anger.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Man, being reasonable, must get drunk the best of life is but intoxication.
author: Lord Byron

quote: I have always thought the actions of men the best interpreters of their thoughts.
author: John Locke

quote: I think every girl needs to love herself, regardless of anything. Like if you're having a bad day, if you don't like your hair, if you don't have the best family situation, whatever, you have to love yourself and you can't do anything until you love yourself first.
author: Julianne Hough

quote: Being a teenager is an amazing time and a hard time. It's when you make your best friends - I have girls who will never leave my heart and I still talk to. You get the best and the worst as a teen. You have the best friendships and the worst heartbreaks.
author: Sophia Bush

quote: Faith in oneself is the best and safest course.
author: Michelangelo

quote: Let us put theology out of religion. Theology has always sent the worst to heaven, the best to hell.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: Now I know that Wal-Mart's policies do not reflect the best way of doing business and the values that I think are important in America.
author: Hillary Clinton

quote: I am someone who hopes for the best and prepares for the worst.
author: Hillary Clinton

quote: Sculpture is the best comment that a painter can make on painting.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: I think music is the greatest art form that exists, and I think people listen to music for different reasons, and it serves different purposes. Some of it is background music, and some of it is things that might affect a person's day, if not their life, or change an attitude. The best songs are the ones that make you feel something.
author: Eddie Vedder

quote: The best way to know God is to love many things.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: The best portion of a good man's life is his little, nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and of love.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: The best part about being alone is that you really don't have to answer to anybody. You do what you want.
author: Justin Timberlake

quote: I am neither frustrated nor planning anything other than being the best Secretary of State I could be.
author: Hillary Clinton

quote: There is no doubt that America remains the premier political, economic, military power in the world, and I both expect and count on it remaining so, because I think that's certainly in our best interest but also the best interests of the world.
author: Hillary Clinton

quote: The best morale exist when you never hear the word mentioned. When you hear a lot of talk about it, it's usually lousy.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: I may be as bad as the worst, but, thank God, I am as good as the best.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Take those chances and you can achieve greatness, whereas if you go conservative, you'll never know. I truly believe what doesn't kill you makes you stronger. Even if you fail, learning and moving on is sometimes the best thing.
author: Danica Patrick

quote: But I always think that the best way to know God is to love many things.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Prescription: A physician's guess at what will best prolong the situation with least harm to the patient.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Part of the reason for the ugliness of adults, in a child's eyes, is that the child is usually looking upwards, and few faces are at their best when seen from below.
author: George Orwell

quote: There is only one thing for us to do, and that is to do our level best right where we are every day of our lives To use our best judgment, and then to trust the rest to that Power which holds the forces of the universe in his hands.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: Sometimes your best investments are the ones you don't make.
author: Donald Trump

quote: Employees make the best dates. You don't have to pick them up and they're always tax-deductible.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: Expect the best, plan for the worst, and prepare to be surprised.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: I have found that being honest is the best technique I can use. Right up front, tell people what you're trying to accomplish and what you're willing to sacrifice to accomplish it.
author: Lee Iacocca

quote: No man really knows about other human beings. The best he can do is to suppose that they are like himself.
author: John Steinbeck

quote: I have found it advisable not to give too much heed to what people say when I am trying to accomplish something of consequence. Invariably they proclaim it can't be done. I deem that the very best time to make the effort.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success.
author: Joyce Brothers

quote: Work hard, stay positive, and get up early. It's the best part of the day.
author: George Allen, Sr.

quote: The best time for you to hold your tongue is the time you feel you must say something or bust.
author: Josh Billings

quote: If the United Nations once admits that international disputes can be settled by using force, then we will have destroyed the foundation of the organization and our best hope of establishing a world order.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: Only a mediocre person is always at his best.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: Research has shown that the best way to be happy is to make each day happy.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: A boy's story is the best that is ever told.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: Being forced to work, and forced to do your best, will breed in you temperance and self-control, diligence and strength of will, cheerfulness and content, and a hundred virtues which the idle will never know.
author: Charles Kingsley

quote: The best way to obtain truth and wisdom is not to ask from books, but to go to God in prayer, and obtain divine teaching.
author: Joseph Smith, Jr.

quote: Here's what I tell anybody and this is what I believe. The greatest gift we have is the gift of life. We understand that. That comes from our Creator. We're given a body. Now you may not like it, but you can maximize that body the best it can be maximized.
author: Mike Ditka

quote: Being a blockhead is sometimes the best security against being cheated by a man of wit.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: It is not in the nature of politics that the best men should be elected. The best men do not want to govern their fellowmen.
author: George MacDonald

quote: The best thing about giving of ourselves is that what we get is always better than what we give. The reaction is greater than the action.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: If you're feeling insecure and you need to feel special, the best place to go is somewhere foreign where people treat you as special because you're different.
author: Kristin Scott Thomas

quote: No man fails who does his best.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: The size of your accomplishments, the quality of your achievement, will depend very largely on how big a man you see in yourself, what sort of image you get of your possible self, yourself at your best.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: Fit no stereotypes. Don't chase the latest management fads. The situation dictates which approach best accomplishes the team's mission.
author: Colin Powell

quote: I think we all have blocks between us and the best version of ourselves, whether it's shyness, insecurity, anxiety, whether it's a physical block, and the story of a person overcoming that block to their best self. It's truly inspiring because I think all of us are engaged in that every day.
author: Tom Hooper

quote: In the misfortunes of our best friends we always find something not altogether displeasing to us.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Life is short and if you're looking for extension, you had best do well. 'Cause there's good deeds and then there's good intentions. They are as far apart as Heaven and Hell.
author: Ben Harper

quote: I find myself hoping a total end of all the unhappy divisions of mankind by party-spirit, which at best is but the madness of many for the gain of a few.
author: Alexander Pope

quote: Wishful thinking is not idealism. It is self-indulgence at best and self-exaltation at worst. In either case, it is usually at the expense of others. In other words, it is the opposite of idealism.
author: Thomas Sowell

quote: Power is always dangerous. Power attracts the worst and corrupts the best.
author: Edward Abbey

quote: As a general rule, the most successful man in life is the man who has the best information.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: There are books of which the backs and covers are by far the best parts.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: Knowing that we can be loved exactly as we are gives us all the best opportunity for growing into the healthiest of people.
author: Fred Rogers

quote: The best time I ever had with Joan Crawford was when I pushed her down the stairs in Whatever Happened to Baby Jane?
author: Bette Davis

quote: The intention to live as long as possible isn't one of the mind's best intentions, because quantity isn't the same as quality.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: The future hasn't happened yet and the past is gone. So I think the only moment we have is right here and now, and I try to make the best of those moments, the moments that I'm in.
author: Annie Lennox

quote: The noir hero is a knight in blood caked armor. He's dirty and he does his best to deny the fact that he's a hero the whole time.
author: Frank Miller

quote: I looked on child rearing not only as a work of love and duty but as a profession that was fully as interesting and challenging as any honorable profession in the world and one that demanded the best that I could bring to it.
author: Rose Kennedy

quote: For Forms of Government let fools contest whatever is best administered is best.
author: Alexander Pope

quote: The best thing we can do if we want the Russians to let us be Americans is to let the Russians be Russian.
author: George F. Kennan

quote: You should read history and look at ostracism, persecution, martyrdom, and that kind of thing. They always happen to the best men, you know.
author: George Eliot

quote: Brevity is the best recommendation of speech, whether in a senator or an orator.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: We should often feel ashamed of our best actions if the world could see all the motives which produced them.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: We should often blush for our very best actions, if the world did but see all the motives upon which they were done.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: The best way to keep your friends is not to give them away.
author: Wilson Mizner

quote: I love that for Barack, there is no such thing as 'us' and 'them' - he doesn't care whether you're a Democrat, a Republican, or none of the above... he knows that we all love our country... and he's always ready to listen to good ideas... he's always looking for the very best in everyone he meets.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: Use those talents you have. You will make it. You will give joy to the world. Take this tip from nature: The woods would be a very silent place if no birds sang except those who sang best.
author: Bernard Meltzer

quote: The wildest colts make the best horses.
author: Plutarch

quote: The best interpreter of the law is custom.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: The best part of beauty is that which no picture can express.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: Blondes make the best victims. They're like virgin snow that shows up the bloody footprints.
author: Alfred Hitchcock

quote: Education must provide the opportunities for self-fulfillment it can at best provide a rich and challenging environment for the individual to explore, in his own way.
author: Noam Chomsky

quote: You must be worthy of the best, but not more worthy than the rest.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: As long as you as an individual... can convince yourself that in order to move forward as best you can you have to be optimistic, you can be described as 'one of the faithful,' one of those people who can say, 'Well, look, something's going to happen! Let's just keep trying. Let's not give up.
author: Tom Hanks

quote: I think the best thing I can do is to be a distraction. A husband lives and breathes his work all day long. If he comes home to more table thumping, how can the poor man ever relax?
author: Jackie Kennedy

quote: Focused. I'm a hustler. And my hustle is trying to figure out the best ways to do what I like without having to do much else.
author: Mos Def

quote: You may call God love, you may call God goodness. But the best name for God is compassion.
author: Meister Eckhart

quote: I want to talk to the bullied kids of the world. Tell them to hang on, it will get better. Know that an 'Iron Chef,' actors, musicians, artists and all successful people have probably been bullied in their life. And the best part of your life is yet to come. Whatever it takes to live, do it!
author: Cat Cora

quote: Beer, it's the best damn drink in the world.
author: Jack Nicholson

quote: If anything I try to write something that would be more difficult to film. I tend to see film as competition and would like instead to do what books do best.
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: Do you remember when you were 10 or 11 years old and you really thought your folks were the best? They were completely omniscient and you took their word for everything. And then you got older and you went through this hideous age when suddenly they were the devil, they were bullies, and they didn't know anything.
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: The principle of all successful effort is to try to do not what is absolutely the best, but what is easily within our power, and suited for our temperament and condition.
author: John Ruskin

quote: Everyone is your best friend when you are successful. Make sure that the people that you surround yourself with are also the people that you are not afraid of failing with.
author: Paula Abdul

quote: A majority is always better than the best repartee.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: The best security for civilization is the dwelling, and upon properly appointed and becoming dwellings depends, more than anything else, the improvement of mankind.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Words are not as satisfactory as we should like them to be, but, like our neighbours, we have got to live with them and must make the best and not the worst of them.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: This is the patent age of new inventions for killing bodies, and for saving souls. All propagated with the best intentions.
author: Lord Byron

quote: It's best to have failure happen early in life. It wakes up the Phoenix bird in you so you rise from the ashes.
author: Anne Baxter

quote: At best the family teaches the finest things human beings can learn from one another generosity and love. But it is also, all too often, where we learn nasty things like hate, rage and shame.
author: Barbara Ehrenreich

quote: The best thing commercially, which is the worst artistically, by and large, is the most successful.
author: Orson Welles
