quote: I've always wanted to be an actress, ever since I was a little girl. I always played the mom and I played my sister as the daughter. I wanted to be an actress on television and movies instead of just around the house.
author: Dakota Fanning

quote: My dad named me Dakota and my mom came up with my first name Hannah. So it's Hannah Dakota Fanning.
author: Dakota Fanning

quote: I didn't really know what I wanted to do, and then I got this call from a casting director in Los Angeles. She remembered me from something years before, and she called my mom wanting me to audition for this thing.
author: Scott Speedman

quote: My mom would be leaving the house and she'd say, 'Don't you pull out all of the old dresses in the attic and put on a show again!' And the door would close, and that's exactly what I'd do. The show was calling me!
author: Michael Patrick King

quote: I do believe that there are African Americans who have thick accents. My mom has a thick accent my relatives have thick accents. But sometimes you have to adjust when you go into the world of film, TV, theatre, in order to make it accessible to people.
author: Viola Davis

quote: My mom once lost track of me at the zoo and when she found me I was lecturing a man about the difference between dromedary and Bactrian camels. I was about 3 1/2.
author: Patrick Rothfuss

quote: Work ethic has always been stressed in my family. My dad is going to be 80 years old and he still works part time. My mom just retired a couple years ago and she's in her mid- to late 70s.
author: Jamie Moyer

quote: I was home-schooled, was always very close with my mom and was very straight-laced and square. I was never the rebellious one, and I never threw hissy fits.
author: Brie Larson

quote: I was 3 when I told my mom that I knew what my dharma was and that I wanted to be an actor.
author: Brie Larson

quote: For a kid who's lost his mom and all the rage and grief that no one was able to talk out of me, football was a very therapeutic sport. Very.
author: Jon Hamm

quote: I wanted to marry a girl just like my mom.
author: Michael Bergin

quote: But the fact is, I'm not work-identified. I'm not a lawyer or a writer. I'm a mom, and I'm a woman, and that's the kind of people I want to see in books in the starring role.
author: Lisa Scottoline

quote: My father left... but I tell my mom - and I told my mom this when I was a kid - I said, 'You know what, Mom? Good thing he left because you're a strong woman.'
author: J. R. Martinez

quote: When I came out of my mom's womb, I had 'sitcom' stamped on my forehead.
author: Sean Hayes

quote: I played with dolls until I was 15. My mother encouraged it because my older sister got married when she was 15, so Mom thought that the longer I stayed with dolls, the better.
author: Linda Evans

quote: I'm probably a little more like my dad. But because of my mom, I never saw being a woman as being an impediment to being able to do something. She had her Ph.D. before I was born.
author: Mary Cheney

quote: My brother Jim and I spent many wonderful summers working on dairy farms in Wisconsin owned by Mom's cousins, and as members of our local Boy Scout troop.
author: Peter Agre

quote: When Queer Eye hit, the church told my mom they were praying for me. She said, God loves him too. And I support him 100 percent.
author: Jai Rodriguez

quote: My mom doesn't get the whole gay thing, but she loves me.
author: Jai Rodriguez

quote: I had said to some pastor that I was having thoughts, and the church turned on me. They went to my mom and said, So sorry about your son.
author: Jai Rodriguez

quote: I am a mom as well as a senator!
author: Patty Murray

quote: I had so many offers after 'True Blood' for things that were someone in the same vein, but nowhere near Alan Ball's vision. Or something that was over-the-top and fantastical. And I've always wanted to play the regular, working-class mom, and I've never really had the chance to do that.
author: Michelle Forbes

quote: I'd never really babysat. I feel like I'm Blair, or 'Gossip Girl.' A teenager, basically - and now suddenly I'm a mom?
author: Cecily von Ziegesar

quote: I always wanted to be a mom.
author: Kate Hudson

quote: When my dad was badly weakened by the flu and my mom wanted to call an ambulance to take him to the emergency room, he wouldn't go unless he could shave first and change into a nice shirt and a pair of slacks.
author: Rich Lowry

quote: I don't deal with death very well. My brother, John Candy, my dad, my mom, Brandon Tartikoff just a couple of weeks ago. I mean, you lose a lot of people in your life, and that's one thing I am constantly working on - pain management.
author: James Belushi

quote: Every family is different. I am mom and I am dad and I'm going to do my best. You should be proud, walk through life saying I have the coolest family. I am part of a modern family.
author: Ricky Martin

quote: I would borrow my mom's red Borghese lipstick and smear it on like a clown!
author: Brooke Burns

quote: There was a point - when I was a kid - where I said I wanted to be like Luke Skywalker, with blond hair and blue eyes. My mom right there told me to never be ashamed of who I am.
author: Chaske Spencer

quote: I got tackled once in a movie theater. I was with my mom and brother, and then suddenly I got hit from behind and sort of sprawled out on the candy counter.
author: Scott Wolf

quote: For example, I loved English and history at school. I would have loved to have done a degree in either. But my Mom said I didn't have time for university.
author: Vanessa Mae

quote: I've had to adapt my wardrobe to my various roles, both at the office, as a mom, and for television. When I shop for the season I look for pieces that will suit every facet of my daily life, not just one single occasion.
author: Nina Garcia

quote: Married and divorced, three beautiful daughters, two in college. The other one is 16, lives with her mom. I'm 46, I've worked for the Post Office for 18 years, seven facilities in three states.
author: Arthur Godfrey

quote: I naturally wanted to be saved, so when I came home I told my mom I wanted to be confirmed. That's the way I related to it, being raised an Episcopalian. I went to Dallas and got confirmed.
author: T-Bone Burnett

quote: I heard the Beatles and the Stones, and Mom bought me an electric guitar. I played lead for four years and then switched to bass. One day someone suggested that I should sing, so I sheepishly stepped up to the microphone and the rest is rock history.
author: Glenn Hughes

quote: I wanted to be an astronaut and wanted to go to space camp, but then I found out that I was too short to become an astronaut. My mom really made me believe that if I worked hard enough and if I really wanted to do it, I could do it.
author: Soleil Moon Frye

quote: My mom always made sure I lived my life as a regular kid.
author: Soleil Moon Frye

quote: I had ridiculous amounts of energy. Mom's like, you're driving me crazy - do you want to try gymnastics? From the moment I started it, I loved it and it kind of was like storybook from there.
author: Alicia Sacramone

quote: My mother stopped working when she had my brother. She was a full time mom until I started getting heavily into ice skating lessons, and it got to the point where they really needed my mom to earn an income.
author: Dorothy Hamill

quote: I didn't really get into golf until I was about 14. My mom and dad were taking lessons from a pro an hour and a half from our farm in Cohuna, Australia. When they got home, I'd ask my mom to explain everything they learned - drills and all.
author: Stuart Appleby

quote: My mother was predominately a stay-at-home mom.
author: Andrew Rannells

quote: No, like I said, my dad was never really part of the tennis. His involvement around what I did with the tennis and with my mom and my grandparents was really not a part of my life.
author: Jimmy Connors

quote: I think my mom threatened to put me up for adoption a few times.
author: Ivanka Trump

quote: At 3 years old, I was imitating and doing fun little commercials for the family. Then at 5, I knew, 'OK, this is something I really like.' At 8, I was crying in front of the mirror and my mom was like, 'Oh boy, here we go. We know what she's going to do.'
author: Lana Parrilla

quote: I never liked apples. In fact, when I was a little girl, my mom wanted to give me apples in my lunch box and I would ask for green peppers. So bizarre... It's funny - I don't have an apple a day, but I can say that I have a few a week.
author: Lana Parrilla

quote: My mom and father are extremely proud. They love it when I don't die. I've done so many movies where I've died that their first question when I book a job is, 'So, are you going to die in this?'
author: Michael Ealy

quote: My mom has a tape from when I was, like, 2 years old, talking with my grandma, telling her a story that's really elaborate about werewolves and wolves.
author: Amanda Hocking

quote: I couldn't wait until I grew up. I used to look at my mom's stockings and put them on with her high heels and mess with my hair.
author: Florence Griffith Joyner

quote: My mom grew up in Kansas, my dad in Indiana. They had boring childhoods.
author: Hunter Parrish

quote: My mom was a dancer, my dad's a singer and I've always had that kind of music in my life.
author: Elvis Stojko

quote: My mom died of cancer when I was really young. I'm not someone who tries to work out their own stuff with a role, but I think that happened despite my best efforts to keep myself separate from it.
author: Sarah Polley

quote: My mom sent me to regular high school because she wanted me to have that experience and not say that I missed out, but I didn't like it at all. I'm more comfortable in the world that I'm in, I grew up in it so when I get around normal kids in regular high school I don't know what to do. I feel more secure in an adult environment.
author: Alexa Vega

quote: We've got activists all across the country like the members of the Million Mom March organization, some of their leaders are here tonight. We're phone banking congressional offices and pursuing editorial boards.
author: Michael D. Barnes

quote: My dad and mom divorced when I was around ten, and I didn't live with him after that, though he was close by and we saw each other weekly. I wasn't really aware that he was a writer I didn't start reading his writing until I was about fifteen. It occurred to me then that my dad was kind of special he's still one of my favorite writers.
author: Andre Dubus III

quote: Sometimes, if you don't have kids yourself, it's assumed you won't understand or know how to play a mom, which is kind of silly if you think about it.
author: Tricia Helfer

quote: I wasn't always a writer. When I went to college and majored in fine arts, I was a painter. Then I was a stay-at-home mom.
author: Janet Evanovich

quote: It's always been a dream of mine to get somewhere and to have my mom and dad with me up there.
author: Haley Reinhart

quote: Dad worked his entire career as an aviation technician. Mom was a legal secretary who became a teacher. We lived a simple American life.
author: Brian Sandoval

quote: My mom was a Democrat and I was scared to death that she was gonna blow it. First I was going to hell with Monroe, and now to Republican hell with Nixon.
author: Tommy Rettig

quote: It's impossible to put yourself first when you're a mom.
author: Jillian Michaels

quote: My parents were both in show business. My father was an actor, my mom an actress, and both singers, dancers and actors. They met in Los Angeles doing a play together and so I grew up in a show biz family.
author: Micky Dolenz

quote: My dad was a good athlete. My mom had longevity. There were some athletic genes that certainly got passed down.
author: Hale Irwin

quote: Usually a family is led through the mom or the dad and their career and for the family to be led by my career, even though God has led it, could be a lot of pressure.
author: Stacie Orrico

quote: I wasn't one to go out and buy a new car and stereo system and expensive clothes. My mom helped keep me grounded.
author: Christina Applegate

quote: My dad's an architect and my mom owned a French bakery for twelve years.
author: Alison Lohman

quote: Well, I am not really a conventional mom at all. Like, I had my kids really young. I had Danny when I was 18 or 19 and then Liam when I was 23 and Molly, I had when I was a little older.
author: Monica Potter

quote: As a mom, I understand how important it is to ensure kids start their day right and always make sure my kids have a nutritious breakfast. One in five U.S. children live in homes where food is not always available, which is why I partnered with Kellogg's on their 'Share Your Breakfast' campaign, which provide breakfasts to kids in need.
author: Monica Potter

quote: My mom thought I might be good for voiceover. She thought I had a cute voice, so maybe I could do a cartoon or something. And while we were looking into that, we also thought I should get into theater acting, so I tried it and the first audition I went on, I booked it. And it kind of just snowballed from there.
author: Atticus Shaffer

quote: Just recently I was in Target with my mom shopping, and out of the blue, I see this father and his two daughters and he says, 'Can they get a picture with you?' And I'm thinking to myself, 'Am I the one millionth customer or something?'
author: Atticus Shaffer

quote: I've always been homeschooled, so doing it on set is kind of the same thing. My mom makes it very interactive - we'll get a book on chocolate and learn how to make it, or she will buy antique items. I love military history, the mechanics and strategy of it.
author: Atticus Shaffer

quote: I was two years old when my mom put me in mommy and me classes. I always had a lot of energy so it was the perfect fit!
author: Aly Raisman

quote: I'm almost a full-time mom.
author: Ekaterina Gordeeva

quote: My mom and my dad wanted my brother and I to have a better life, you know, better education, better jobs. It was probably harder, much, much harder, for my parents. When you're a kid, you can learn a language much more easily I learned English in less than a year.
author: Mila Kunis

quote: It was definitely a part of our life. I mean, my mom had both her brothers and her fiancee in Vietnam at the same time, so it wasn't just my dad's story, it was my mom's story too. And we definitely grew up listening to the stories.
author: Vanessa Kerry

quote: I'm not a figurehead for anything. I was a single mom with two kids. What else was I going to do? It was either be in a band or be a waitress.
author: Chrissie Hynde

quote: I told my agents that I didn't want to go on the audition. But as that was happening I called my mom, who has been watching the show from the beginning, and my mom said, 'It's the coolest show. You have to go.'
author: Mary Lynn Rajskub

quote: My mom is still yelling at me because she needs more autographed pictures.
author: Ashton Kutcher

quote: I'm named after a horse. My mom's best friend had a horse named Brooke, so my dad suggested 'Brooklyn' as a more formal version, and it just stuck - and now I live in Brooklyn part-time, so go figure.
author: Brooklyn Decker

quote: But my mother and father were married when my mom was 20 and my dad was 24.
author: Rachael Leigh Cook

quote: You know that I am living proof that the American Dream is real. Growing up, our congressman cut through government bureaucratic red tape to help my mom buy our first house. That's the kind of congressman I'll be.
author: Geoff Davis

quote: When I was 11 my friend's mom made a peanut butter sandwich. I ate the sandwich and was like, 'I'm never eating anything else again.' And I still eat peanut butter every day. I would put peanut butter on a steak.
author: Aasif Mandvi

quote: My mom raised us three boys by herself on welfare. It's not worse than anybody else's life.
author: Jeffrey Donovan

quote: Now, if you're Al Gore, you can afford $10 a pop for squiggly-pig-tailed fluorescent light bulbs. But if you're mainstream America, two or three kids, mom and dad working outside the home, that's not a very good deal.
author: Joe Barton

quote: I still feel like a kid sometimes myself so hard to believe that I'm a mom. Now I'm an adult! It only took 38 years!
author: Ana Ortiz

quote: I was really lucky. My gal pal was my mom.
author: Ana Ortiz

quote: In third grade, I was taking tap-dance lessons, and about six weeks before the recital I wanted to quit. My mom said, 'No, you're going to stay with it.' Well, I did it, and I was bad, too! But my parents never let their kids walk away from something because it was too hard.
author: Rebecca Lobo

quote: I love to fly. I always wanted to fly. It's been one of my dreams since I was 3 years old. I remember saying to my mom, 3 years old, every day, 'I can fly!' Living on the ninth floor, it was dangerous.
author: Elena Anaya

quote: In fact, my mom always told me because I was the daughter of an Army officer born overseas in Paris, France, that under the Constitution she believed that I could never run for president.
author: Karen Hughes

quote: They wrapped her up like a baby burrito to show to Mom. Here were a mother and her daughter and I love them both so much. I couldn't wait for Courtney to come to the hospital so I could have all my women together.
author: Al Roker

quote: My mom breastfed me for more than a year, and I can't imagine doing it any other way. It's cheap and much better for the environment, and you don't have to lug all that stuff around.
author: Emily Deschanel

quote: I never thought I was a great mom. I always worked. I fell in love with my children as they got older.
author: Marla Gibbs

quote: My mom just understands about stuff. We have a really good trust, and she knows I can take care of myself.
author: Balthazar Getty

quote: I don't have to do a lot to my eyebrows. My mom always told me not to pluck them, which is great advice.
author: Arizona Muse

quote: I remember my mom saying that after you have a baby you get really thin. So you gain all that weight and then you just lose it and keep losing it.
author: Arizona Muse

quote: I feel like I'm a stay-at-home mom, which I was for the five years before this. She's absolutely been my focus. That's the choice I made. Desperate Housewives is perfect for me. I get to go back to work and still be able to take my daughter to school and pick her up.
author: Teri Hatcher

quote: If you just stay away from junk, and stick with what your mom taught you, you're eating pretty healthy.
author: Sprague Grayden

quote: I'm from Manchester, Mass., so it was lobster, lobster and more lobster! Also, lots of fish that we caught in the summers, clam chowder and roast beef sandwiches. But my mom was pretty healthy we had a lot of chicken and broccoli and rice as well.
author: Sprague Grayden

quote: I'm not sure anyone - and I could be wrong in this - grows up thinking, I want to be a single mom.
author: Bridget Moynahan

quote: I'm a mom first, a singer second.
author: Gretchen Wilson

quote: Mom worked with autistic children.
author: Isabel Lucas

quote: So much of our lives are defined by habit or what the guy next to us is doing, never wondering and knowing who and what we support with our actions, from the detergent Mom always used, to my favorite dish I make... A lot of my life is unexamined habit.
author: Kristin Bauer van Straten

quote: My mom was so people-friendly. She was incredible. She'd go to the mall, and she'd talk to everyone. Give people a kiss on the cheek. I think if I wasn't pushed around a lot, I'd be great with people. Maybe I still can be.
author: Fred Couples

quote: My mom was Sicilian, my dad was Sicilian. Mom was a great cook, but all the women were.
author: Chazz Palminteri

quote: I used to do skits for my mom... and I was always entertaining as a kid.
author: Leah Remini

quote: They see me as being this Super Mom on TV who also can more than handle a difficult husband, and they assume I'm going to be just full of wisdom as a mother and wife myself.
author: Patricia Richardson

quote: I took piano for many years. I kicked and screamed through all of my lessons, but my mom really insisted.
author: Kristin Kreuk

quote: When I was 10 years old my mom used to play Tupac while she cleaned the house.
author: Soulja Boy

quote: My dad died when I was three so my mom had to raise four kids on her own, and I think there's a part of me that pulls upon having watched my mom do that our whole lives. She had to make it work.
author: Leslie Bibb

quote: That's a big deal for kids, when they come into the kitchen and the teacher is drinking coffee with mom. They react differently on the next day when you say: 'Sit down and shut-up!'
author: Ed O'Neill

quote: I love my mother Ali so much. I'm a momma's boy. I just have a very cool mom. It's not as though I had any say in the matter. I'm just really fortunate. She's the most kind, loving, giving woman.
author: Hayden Christensen

quote: My mom had gotten a Super 8 camera to make home movies with, and my brother and me got our hands on it and ran with it.
author: Lev Yilmaz

quote: No one was more important than my mom and dad. I know they are watching from a place up in heaven here today to make sure all their kids are doing good.
author: Eddie Murray

quote: I really like Calvin Klein for his classic simplicity. I also think Prabal Gurung designs some great pieces that work well for me. My mom has such great style she's my biggest influence.
author: Isabelle Fuhrman

quote: I never let anyone pluck, including myself, unless my mom approves. She guards my eyebrows. She's like the eyebrow police!
author: Isabelle Fuhrman

quote: My grandmother had six kids - one died as an infant - and she was dirt-poor, and all her kids got an education. And my mom grew up poor. And they both worked so hard and cultivated so much of their own happiness. I wanted to have that like an amulet. Not like armor, but like a magic feather. Like Dumbo's magic feather.
author: Lucy Alibar

quote: I want somebody like my mom. My mom is a very charitable woman. She's the sweetest woman in the world. I'm looking for the second sweetest woman in the world. I'm looking for honesty and a big heart.
author: Jason Derulo

quote: My mom would have liked it that I patterned myself more after Jimmy Reed.
author: Jimmy Smith

quote: My mom and dad - they were always there. They were always on the set. They focused on our family life. The entertainment business wasn't the end-all. They weren't out to get the next big paycheck or the next big movie. It was about 'What can we do as a family.'
author: Candace Cameron Bure

quote: The military infrastructure grew me. My faith in God is important, my belief in my country is important, my relationship to my family is important, the things that Mom and Dad tell you growing up are important.
author: Tommy Franks

quote: I always think about which blood drive was going on in Georgia that day when that husband or mom or school teacher rolled up their sleeve and actually gave me a second chance at life. It's the ultimate gift of life, and I'm the one who was on the other end.
author: Niki Taylor

quote: I was a big fan of 'The Smurfs' growing up, even though by default - my mom used to force me to watch because she was a 'Smurfs' fan.
author: Jayma Mays

quote: My mom was a big 'Smurfs' fan, so she would force me to watch every Saturday morning. I had no choice in the matter. I would jump downstairs on Saturday morning, 'Hurray, cartoons!' and she would say, 'Smurfs! That's what you're watching.'
author: Jayma Mays

quote: When I was little, we lived on 8 acres and my mom had a horse. But when I was 7, my mom kicked my dad out, and then in order to feed us five kids, she got critters cheap or for free and raised them for food. We milked a cow, raised chickens, pigs and beef cattle. We heated our one-story house with wood and stayed cold all winter.
author: Bonnie Jo Campbell

quote: I grew up with the classics. My mom and I would sit and watch 'Singin' in the Rain' and 'White Christmas' - those kind of movies.
author: Lucas Grabeel

quote: Two weeks ago at the U.S. Amateur, my mom caddied, and that is kind of a different feeling, because she's your mom and you have to listen to her. It was really comfortable having my mom there, but it's also really relieving and comfortable to have someone that knows the course off their hat, really.
author: Lydia Ko

quote: My mom is a very warm, typical sort of Jewish-mother type. And my dad has a somewhat, um, different personality.
author: Peter Orszag

quote: I hope that through my work, artists will take some chances, break some rules, and make art that comes from inside of them. I would like to be remembered as a kind person, a great Mom, and a bit unruly - in a good way!
author: Angela Cartwright

quote: I think there's a time to work, and everyone has to kind of adjust. And then there's a time to relax, and be the mom or take the kids on vacation when you need to wind down. So it's a matter of planning, and being able to map out your year or your week or let's start with the day. It is just being multi-tasking and being available.
author: Vanessa Williams

quote: Well, my mom taught public school music for almost 40 years. And she's about 5 feet - and very mighty. And she would control her kids a lot by giving them the eye, or the stare.
author: Vanessa Williams

quote: She had a hit for every syllable: 'Don't. You. Ever. Talk. To. Me. Like. That. Ever. Again.' That was the last time I ever talked back to Mom.
author: Misty May-Treanor

quote: My mom's passionate and energetic and very funny and enthusiastic.
author: Eric Stonestreet

quote: My whole life sort of ended when my mom died.
author: Cheryl Strayed

quote: I always tell people, I'm a better swimmer because I'm a mom and a better mom because I'm swimmer.
author: Amanda Beard

quote: People close to me called me 'Curry in a Hurry.' I was moving through life at 100 miles an hour trying to further my career and be a great mom and make everyone happy.
author: Ann Curry

quote: I think my first big purchase was actually for my mom. She had one of those '90s TVs in her living room that's like a 10x10 brick, so I purchased her a flatscreen for her living room.
author: Dave Franco

quote: I'm not sure what I want to do when I grow up, or if I'm sure I ever want to grow up. I'm sure there are people that wish I would, but you know, my mom will get over it.
author: Jerry Doyle

quote: My mom had to beg the guys to let me play. I couldn't even play the drums right - Brian had to show me.
author: Dennis Wilson

quote: It's quite hard to have your mom as a teacher - it's like, she's not necessarily a 'real teacher' for me. But she'd always teach me to really hear the music, and develop my ear, and to try and hear the harmonics of the piano.
author: Birdy

quote: My mom's a concert pianist, so she started teaching me when I was around seven. When I was eight, I started writing my own songs, and kinda started putting piano and singing together. But I'm trained classically, which is a big influence on me, I think.
author: Birdy

quote: We're definitely a hodgepodge of influences. Mine, most heavily, would be Southern rock - the Allman Brothers, Lynyrd Skynyrd and stuff like that. Hillary is more from the country side - her mom is Linda Davis, a country singer. Dave, he's a big fan of the Eagles and like that.
author: Charles Kelley

quote: My mom was the picture of the blue-collar mom: Two and three and four jobs to make sure that me and my sister never needed, that was her thing.
author: Ne-Yo

quote: For the first few years of my life my mom used to cut my hair so there were a lot of bowl-cut hair styles.
author: Ne-Yo

quote: I probably wouldn't be singing if not for Michael Jackson. When I started singing, I didn't like my tone until my mom put me on to Michael Jackson and Stevie Wonder, so listening to the way they used their instrument helped me get more comfortable with my own.
author: Ne-Yo

quote: I was serious about ballet for a long time, but my mom got me into tap and jazz and modern and hip-hop, and I was one of those over-lessoned children.
author: Greta Gerwig

quote: My earliest acting memory is making up a play for my mom and dad called The Lonesome Baby. I have no idea what The Lonesome Baby was about. I just remember the title. But I'm sure it was an epic.
author: Jane Horrocks

quote: I think if I could be any superhero, it'd probably be my mom... but I don't think I'd look too good in high heels, so it's not gonna happen.
author: Jason Behr

quote: I am very proud of my mom and consider her the most courageous woman I know. With perseverance, sacrifice and hard work, she raised a family of Olympic athletes and gave us the tools and the spirit to succeed. That is something that my brothers and I will always be thankful for.
author: Diana Lopez

quote: My mom's collard greens. No one else in the world can make them like hers. I'm not just saying that because she's my mom. She's got some Mississippi secret. I could seriously eat them every day.
author: Santigold

quote: It's the best thing ever - I love being a mom. This is my only child. My career was a priority earlier in my life, but now my son is definitely the priority.
author: Stephanie Mills

quote: I love every second of being a mom.
author: Lily Aldridge

quote: When I can 10 or 11, my mom was the one out there catching passes for me. She was my prime receiver.
author: Joe Theismann

quote: My mom was very strict when I was growing up. I could not talk to boys until I was 18. I had to study and work hard.
author: Coco Lee

quote: I'm not a businessperson. I have no sense of money. My mom does everything for me. She makes all my decisions for me, and even buys my clothes. She's very protective.
author: Coco Lee

quote: I'm a mom, a full-time mom when I'm not taping. I do the carpool thing, and bake the cookies, and do the homework.
author: Vanna White

quote: It would be great to do another television show that was a multi-camera because the hours are so wonderful and you can be a good mom at the same time. The problem is, there aren't a lot of multi-camera shows that I personally like. My aesthetic is more geared toward single-camera shows.
author: Kaitlin Olson

quote: My mom, Emilie, always taught me to think hard about marriage.
author: Alyson Hannigan

quote: My mom was a photographer and whenever they needed a baby for a modelling job, she'd stick me in front of the camera. That's how it started.
author: Alyson Hannigan

quote: I love Westerns and I remember as a kid climbing up on the couch and make it into a saddle and shoot guns and fall off. I would lay there after my death and my mom would tell me to eat lunch and I'd say, 'I'm still dead, Mom!' I was Method, even then.
author: Creed Bratton

quote: When I was a child it was very clear what I was allowed to see and what I was not allowed to see and there was no discussion or option or negotiation. Whatever my mom said, that's what went down.
author: Yul Vazquez

quote: My mom put me in dance classes when I was 5 years old.
author: Danny Pudi

quote: When I see my mom in the stands, it always pushes me to succeed.
author: Ashton Eaton

quote: I think it would be a lot easier if I said, 'I feel like a dude,' but I was raised by a southern mom, so I know how to put on lipstick and walk in heels and rock that look. It's exactly that juxtaposition that confuses people.
author: Saskia de Brauw

quote: My mom and dad are both in stand-up comedy, so that's where I started, that's where I got everything. My roots are holding the mic.
author: Pauly Shore

quote: My mom is two people to me. She's my mom number one, and then she's this lady most comedians know as being a legendary owner of a nightclub that's responsible for starting a lot of heavy careers.
author: Pauly Shore

quote: When I was six years old my friend was auditioning for 'Annie,' and I decided I wanted to audition with her. My mom was worried I would fall flat on my face because I'd never opened my mouth to sing, so she sent me to vocal lessons. I did the audition and fell in love with the entire process of a show.
author: Jacqueline Emerson

quote: I think of myself as a fairly attractive girl and always have, thanks to my mom. I was brought into this world thinking I was gorgeous because my mother was extremely devoted to this notion.
author: Amy Schumer

quote: I remember my mom had a big collection of copies of Saturday Evening Post magazines, and that was really my introduction to those great illustrators.
author: Thomas Kincade

quote: I know this is kind of corny, but we thought about renewing our vows again because I think my mom would really love it if we did that in Arkansas, where I came from.
author: Mary Steenburgen

quote: I've been an atheist since I was nine years old. And my mom is really religious, so we have a strange relationship. But if my mother was right, what would be the reason that the gods could let anything bad happen in the world?
author: Tarsem Singh

quote: My mom and I have always had issues.
author: Mindy McCready

quote: I'm a mom first.
author: Mindy McCready

quote: I'm not blaming my mom for my life because I am responsible for me, and nobody can change me or ruin me easier than I can.
author: Mindy McCready

quote: My dad is a lawyer and my mom is an artist. So growing up was exactly what it sounds like - strict household but a lot of creativity. They are so psyched that I get to make music for a living. My parents rule.
author: Ty Segall

quote: Well I was eight years old, and I have an older cousin who is three years older than me and she was doing acting, commercials, and modeling at the time and... to see my cousin doing that was really inspiring and I wanted to do it. So I went to my mom and I asked her if I could do it, and for the acting part of it, she made me study for a year.
author: Hailee Steinfeld

quote: I'm a just a mom when I walk down the street.
author: Alice Barrett

quote: Naturally, people are curious about how my real mom feels about me having a TV mom.
author: Rico Rodriguez

quote: I just started watching wrestling in 2008, and I've loved it ever since. I told my mom I wanted to become a wrestler.
author: Rico Rodriguez

quote: My mom taught me how to make grilled chicken, and I bake, too.
author: Rico Rodriguez

quote: For as long as I've been acting, I have been very lucky to be paired with really great actresses playing my mom.
author: Rico Rodriguez

quote: When I was going on auditions, it was nerve-racking. I'd always say to my mom that it would be awesome if I could get a series. When Modern Family came along, I said, 'You know what, Mom? I believe I'm going to get this role.'
author: Rico Rodriguez

quote: For some students, school is the only place where they get a hot meal and a warm hug. Teachers are sometimes the only ones who tell our children they can go from an Indian reservation to the Ivy League, from the home of a struggling single mom to the White House.
author: Denise Juneau

quote: I always had an interest in fashion because my mom is a celebrity fashion stylist. I grew up being on set or in showrooms.
author: Jasmine Tookes

quote: My mom always taught me to be sweet and polite and cross my legs because it's what the guys like. Actually, they like a raunchy girl once in a while.
author: Tiffani Amber Thiessen

quote: My original inspiration was my mom: a few years after the death of my dad, she started dating one my teachers!
author: Meg Cabot

quote: If I go on dates, my mom is always with me. She's always there making sure I'm all right. Like if I go to see a movie with a boy, she'll go to dinner next door.
author: Ariel Winter

quote: An agent saw one of the plays I did at ACT, but my mom was like, No, she's too young. I became so annoying that a year and a half later she just couldn't stand hearing me any more!
author: Marla Sokoloff

quote: Cancer has been unfortunately in my life. My mom's best friend is kicking ass in her battle with breast cancer. Both of my grandmas had cancer. I recently lost a friend to cancer.
author: Marla Sokoloff

quote: I spend so much time with my parents. My mom and I were joined at the hip for five years. There was not one moment when I wasn't with her.
author: Kay Panabaker

quote: My mom still lives in Denver and some of my brothers are still in the area, so I still have strong ties there.
author: Terrell Davis

quote: When I'm in the gym, I'm in the gym, and that is my focus. But when I'm not in the gym, I'm enjoying being a mom and taking care of those responsibilities .. They really do provide me with the balance that I need to be a more complete athlete.
author: Melanie Roach

quote: I'm looking forward to being a mom and a wife and a business owner.
author: Melanie Roach

quote: I've been a pretty selfish mom and a very unselfish athlete for about three years now and it's time to put my family first. It's probably time to move on.
author: Melanie Roach

quote: My first big job was an Abercrombie &ampFitch campaign. But my mom wouldn't let me skip school for it, so I missed half of the shoot. When we got there, we realized Bruce Weber was the photographer we knew we had made a mistake!
author: Lauren Bush

quote: My mom and my stepdad are both therapists.
author: Jennifer Westfeldt

quote: My mom is a constant in my life in so many ways.
author: Kerri Walsh

quote: My mom was diagnosed with breast cancer when I was 13 and it was something we weren't really aware of as a family.
author: Rima Fakih

quote: My mom told me to do whatever I wanted to do and don't get too anxious about it.
author: David Giuntoli

quote: Sometimes when my mom finds a fun article and really wants me to read it, I will. But I prefer to just kind of focus on what I want to do and not really what other people are saying, because I don't want that to affect me too much.
author: Missy Franklin

quote: My mom and dad put my brother and sister through university and they were very keen for us to have an academic background just to give us a chance.
author: Rob James-Collier

quote: I had really great parents who always gave me lots of opportunity for choice, but I didn't always realize how rare that was for a girl for them to say, 'You can be a mom or have a career or do both or do something we haven't thought of yet.'
author: Ally Condie

quote: You eat and sleep it all day long and play on the streets until mom calls you in. My story is no different than anybody else's.
author: Adam Oates

quote: When you become a mom you just learn how to function sleep deprived and you do get used to it. I came back to work when Finley was three months old and the first few months were rough. Then somehow you learn to exist on no sleep and now when he does upon occasion sleep through the night, which is like a full six hours, you're pretty sure he's suffocating. So you don't sleep anyway.
author: Holly Marie Combs

quote: I think there's a danger of a being typecast as the all-American mom forever.
author: JoBeth Williams

quote: My Mom is a ballet director, so I had this idea in me that classical training is the best foundation for anything you do, so I wanted to get a classical background and voice.
author: Shuler Hensley

quote: Everyone in my family is an artist. Both my parents are painters and my mom's an opera singer. I was never shown any other way to process life.
author: Aleksa Palladino

quote: Losing my mom at such a young age had a profound effect on my life.
author: Molly Shannon

quote: I think I'm going to spend some time learning how to be a first-time mom, and then I'll go back to work.
author: Linda Cardellini

quote: My dad was Jewish. My mom is not. So I was not raised anything.
author: Matt Lauer

quote: Growing up I always shopped at Victoria's Secret with my mom and saw Angels like Gisele and Karolina Kurkova in the windows.
author: Lindsay Ellingson

quote: When I was young, I had two older sisters, and since I was the youngest in my family, my mom took me around with her all the time. I was forever with her when she was having coffee in the middle of the afternoon with her three sisters. And they would talk about men. I absorbed a lot of that.
author: Richard LaGravenese

quote: My earliest memory is seeing Michael Jackson in Melbourne with my sister when I was about ten. I still have this souvenir stick with a glove that would light up and make a peace sign in a bunch of different colors. I'm so happy my mom didn't throw that out.
author: Emilie de Ravin

quote: I was born to a Nigerian dad and a Kenyan mom, and coming to the States was really academic.
author: Dayo Okeniyi

quote: Oh, my mom. She's one of my biggest fans.
author: Patina Miller

quote: They very seldom let me lose my cool. They made me like I was Polly Perfect, which was ridiculous so that when I bump into kids on the street they'd say 'I wish my Mom were like you.'
author: Charlotte Rae

quote: I usually travel with a lot of people, like my dad, mom and sisters.
author: Booboo Stewart

quote: I'm a '70s mom, and my daughter is a '90s mom. I know a lot of women my age who are real computer freaks.
author: Florence Henderson

quote: My mom was a professional fitness competitor, so I go into the gym with her. I train with my dad and mother. It's embarrassing, because she's really strong.
author: Booboo Stewart

quote: Part of the reason that I moved to Los Angeles is that even though my mom introduced me to all kinds of music, I really wanted to work on having my own identify, on being who I am and doing what I do, and seeing how people responded.
author: Schuyler Fisk

quote: I'm extremely blessed to have the extraordinary mother that I have, and I don't mean Diana Ross, I mean the mother. My mom paved a road that didn't exist, as did Oprah.
author: Tracee Ellis Ross

quote: My mom taught me to go after my dreams. I have this faith in myself that I must have gotten from her.
author: Amy Jo Johnson

quote: Because of my unique experience as my mom's child, the beginning of my journey was more about me trying to figure out who I was on my own. My mom is one of the greatest moms and so supportive of all my siblings and of all of us being who we are, and not who she wanted us to be.
author: Tracee Ellis Ross

quote: I've been acting my whole life. I have this huge imagination! I'm a dancer and my mom's a dance teacher, and I was always performing and entertaining people. I'd go to see live theatre or a movie, and I'd become the main character for a few days afterwards. I loved being somebody new for a temporary amount of time.
author: Natasha Calis

quote: So, from a very young age, my mom tells me that I wanted to be Michael J. Fox. I didn't want to be an actor. I just wanted to be Michael J. Fox for awhile. And then, I realized that he was an actor, so I pursued that.
author: Patrick J. Adams

quote: When I was seven, I asked my mom if I could be on TV, and she said if I really wanted to, I could. I got an agent and booked my first audition.
author: Natasha Calis

quote: My mom came from such humble beginnings and especially my dad as well. He didn't go to university.
author: Petra Ecclestone

quote: My mom moved up between Leland and Greenville when I was just a little tot.
author: Little Milton

quote: Well, Mom and Dad are both actors, and I've spent a lot of time watching my mom on stage and a lot of time on set with my dad, so it was very much a part of my growing up.
author: Eleanor Tomlinson

quote: I always was drawn to the performing arts. I started dancing when I was two. I sang, loved to act, and loved going to visit my mom on-set. But she wanted me to have a normal childhood, so I wasn't really allowed to pursue acting till I got older.
author: Rainey Qualley

quote: My mom is a really good cook. I didn't get the cooking gene, but she cooks this really amazing dinner every Christmas, and that's always really fun.
author: Miranda Cosgrove

quote: Last time I spoke to my mom she called me from a pay phone, and we didn't have the best talk. Ever since my stepdad passed away three years ago, she has been very depressed and hasn't been herself at all.
author: Eric West

quote: I love getting my nails done. My mom's best friend is a manicurist. When I was little, she'd do little paintings on my nails, like flowers.
author: Miranda Cosgrove

quote: We've always loved going to the movies. Our mom and dad are big movie fans. They'd take us on these movie orgys where we'd see sometimes three movies in a day.
author: Andy Wachowski

quote: I've been drawing my whole life. My mom says my sister and I were drawing by age 1. Animation seems a real, natural extension of drawing as a way of telling a story visually.
author: Jennifer Yuh Nelson

quote: Anyone who knows me knows my mom, Dorcina, has to sign off on any decision and that she will play a major part in any decision.
author: Nerlens Noel

quote: My mom introduced me to science-fiction.
author: Logan Marshall-Green

quote: Then you've got Georgetown, and I really just like everything about them. When I went down there with my mom, it really opened my eyes to what they were all about. I have to factor in what a school like that can do for me, even away from being a basketball player.
author: Nerlens Noel

quote: I love what I do and I think it shows. As my kids get older, they can see me as a mom who loves working.
author: Jessica Capshaw

quote: I was fortunate enough to have my kids early, so being a mom always ended up being a better gig than these other parts that came along. So I always justified not really working a lot because I had a family.
author: Heather Langenkamp

quote: On my mom's side I'm Mexican, and my dad is a white dude.
author: Tyler Posey

quote: When you have lost people like I lost my birth mom at a young age and you remember the whole process of losing her, you want to grab on to something that makes you whole.
author: Reese Hoffa

quote: I was born to a single mom and raised by her and my grandparents.
author: Anthony Foxx

quote: At first I could not believe what I was reading. I got up from my seat and walked away, talking to myself that I may have found my mom.
author: Reese Hoffa

quote: Our songs touch people, and take them back to a time when there was no threat of terrorism, when you didn't have to lock your doors and when Mom and Dad took care of everything.
author: George Grove

quote: Whether it's a 16-year old girl, or a mom, or a guy, or anybody, as long as they come up and they're excited to meet me 'cause they've had some sort of relationship with something I've created, it's the coolest thing ever. It never gets old. It's awesome.
author: Andy Grammer

quote: My mom is in the navy and my dad works for the army, but I never called them 'sir' or 'ma'am' or anything like that, and we never really moved around a lot because both my parents were stationed in D.C.
author: Ian Harding

quote: When I was young I thought that money was the most important thing in life now that I am old I know that it is.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: A little thought and a little kindness are often worth more than a great deal of money.
author: John Ruskin

quote: Money has never made man happy, nor will it, there is nothing in its nature to produce happiness. The more of it one has the more one wants.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The lack of money is the root of all evil.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Honesty is the best policy - when there is money in it.
author: Mark Twain

quote: For I can raise no money by vile means.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: He that is of the opinion money will do everything may well be suspected of doing everything for money.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: A business that makes nothing but money is a poor business.
author: Henry Ford

quote: If women didn't exist, all the money in the world would have no meaning.
author: Aristotle Onassis

quote: All I ask is the chance to prove that money can't make me happy.
author: Spike Milligan

quote: Money is only a tool. It will take you wherever you wish, but it will not replace you as the driver.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: It's a kind of spiritual snobbery that makes people think they can be happy without money.
author: Albert Camus

quote: So you think that money is the root of all evil. Have you ever asked what is the root of all money?
author: Ayn Rand

quote: There are people who have money and people who are rich.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: Many people take no care of their money till they come nearly to the end of it, and others do just the same with their time.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Don't stay in bed, unless you can make money in bed.
author: George Burns

quote: After a certain point, money is meaningless. It ceases to be the goal. The game is what counts.
author: Aristotle Onassis

quote: I'd like to live as a poor man with lots of money.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: It is not the creation of wealth that is wrong, but the love of money for its own sake.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: Money is the barometer of a society's virtue.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: A bank is a place that will lend you money if you can prove that you don't need it.
author: Bob Hope

quote: I have no money, no resources, no hopes. I am the happiest man alive.
author: Henry Miller

quote: We go to school to learn to work hard for money. I write books and create products that teach people how to have money work hard for them.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: We've got to put a lot of money into changing behavior.
author: Bill Gates

quote: A wise man should have money in his head, but not in his heart.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: Money is better than poverty, if only for financial reasons.
author: Woody Allen

quote: I've got all the money I'll ever need, if I die by four o'clock.
author: Henny Youngman

quote: A woman's best protection is a little money of her own.
author: Clare Boothe Luce

quote: A good reputation is more valuable than money.
author: Publilius Syrus

quote: Friendship is like money, easier made than kept.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: If saving money is wrong, I don't want to be right!
author: William Shatner

quote: Money is a strange business. People who haven't got it aim it strongly. People who have are full of troubles.
author: Ayrton Senna

quote: Liking money like I like it, is nothing less than mysticism. Money is a glory.
author: Salvador Dali

quote: It doesn't matter about money having it, not having it. Or having clothes, or not having them. You're still left alone with yourself in the end.
author: Billy Idol

quote: A man is usually more careful of his money than of his principles.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quote: Profit is sweet, even if it comes from deception.
author: Sophocles

quote: Money: power at its most liquid.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: If you can count your money, you don't have a billion dollars.
author: J. Paul Getty

quote: Money differs from an automobile or mistress in being equally important to those who have it and those who do not.
author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: It is a waste of money to help those who show no desire to help themselves.
author: Taylor Caldwell

quote: A billion here, a billion there, and pretty soon you're talking about real money.
author: Everett Dirksen

quote: All riches have their origin in mind. Wealth is in ideas - not money.
author: Robert Collier

quote: I've made all my money on my own without my family and I work very hard.
author: Paris Hilton

quote: Banks have a new image. Now you have 'a friend,' your friendly banker. If the banks are so friendly, how come they chain down the pens?
author: Alan King

quote: Money's a horrid thing to follow, but a charming thing to meet.
author: Henry James

quote: A man with money is no match against a man on a mission.
author: Doyle Brunson

quote: Money is our madness, our vast collective madness.
author: David Herbert Lawrence

quote: Men make counterfeit money in many more cases, money makes counterfeit men.
author: Sydney J. Harris

quote: No complaint... is more common than that of a scarcity of money.
author: Adam Smith

quote: Wealth flows from energy and ideas.
author: William Feather

quote: I am fiercely loyal to those willing to put their money where my mouth is.
author: Paul Harvey

quote: Many folks think they aren't good at earning money, when what they don't know is how to use it.
author: Frank A. Clark

quote: There was a time when a fool and his money were soon parted, but now it happens to everybody.
author: Adlai E. Stevenson

quote: Money is always there but the pockets change it is not in the same pockets after a change, and that is all there is to say about money.
author: Gertrude Stein

quote: You have to go broke three times to learn how to make a living.
author: Casey Stengel

quote: Everyone needs a certain amount of money. Beyond that, we pursue money because we know how to obtain it. We don't necessarily know how to obtain happiness.
author: Gregg Easterbrook

quote: If I have enough money to eat I'm good.
author: Shia LaBeouf

quote: The importance of money flows from it being a link between the present and the future.
author: John Maynard Keynes

quote: If God has allowed me to earn so much money, it is because He knows I give it all away.
author: Edith Piaf

quote: Anybody who thinks money will make you happy, hasn't got money.
author: David Geffen

quote: Most men love money and security more, and creation and construction less, as they get older.
author: John Maynard Keynes

quote: It is more rewarding to watch money change the world than watch it accumulate.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: A simple fact that is hard to learn is that the time to save money is when you have some.
author: Joe Moore

quote: A fool and his money are soon parted.
author: Thomas Tusser

quote: I am happy to make money. I want to make more money, make more music, eat Big Macs and drink Budweisers.
author: Kid Rock

quote: Marrying into money was not a good thing for me.
author: Anna Nicole Smith

quote: I'd rather lose my own money than someone else's.
author: Dean Kamen

quote: If I can't get the girl, at least give me more money.
author: Alan Alda

quote: Do what you love and the money will follow.
author: Marsha Sinetar

quote: All my life I knew that there was all the money you could want out there. All you have to do is go after it.
author: Curtis Carlson

quote: If the money we donate helps one child or can ease the pain of one parent, those funds are well spent.
author: Carl Karcher

quote: An important lever for sustained action in tackling poverty and reducing hunger is money.
author: Gro Harlem Brundtland

quote: It is money, money, money! Not ideas, not principles, but money that reigns supreme in American politics.
author: Robert Byrd

quote: Isn't it a shame that future generations can't be here to see all the wonderful things we're doing with their money?
author: Earl Wilson

quote: Ben Franklin may have discovered electricity- but it is the man who invented the meter who made the money.
author: Earl Warren

quote: It was an honor and privilege to arrive to this country 16 years ago with almost no money in my pocket. A lot has happened since then.
author: Antonio Banderas

quote: It's all about the money.
author: Joseph Jackson

quote: What counts is what you do with your money, not where it came from.
author: Merton Miller

quote: A fool and his money are lucky enough to get together in the first place.
author: Stanley Weiser

quote: If money was my only motivation, I would organize myself differently.
author: Placido Domingo

quote: I don't mind that I'm fat. You still get the same money.
author: Marlon Brando

quote: It's easier to force feed people than it is to give 'em what they want. It makes more money.
author: Merle Haggard

quote: My goal wasn't to make a ton of money. It was to build good computers.
author: Steve Wozniak

quote: Civilized countries generally adopt gold or silver or both as money.
author: Alfred Marshall

quote: Don't judge me. I made a lot of money.
author: Samantha Bee

quote: If you make a living, if you earn your own money, you're free - however free one can be on this planet.
author: Theodore White

quote: Money is a mechanism for control.
author: David Korten

quote: All money means to me is a pride in accomplishment.
author: Ray Kroc

quote: In suggesting gifts: Money is appropriate, and one size fits all.
author: William Randolph Hearst

quote: Sudden money is going from zero to two hundred dollars a week. The rest doesn't count.
author: Neil Simon

quote: I don't think business news is just for old white men with money.
author: Neil Cavuto

quote: Fame, I have already. Now I need the money.
author: Wilhelm Steinitz

quote: It is usually people in the money business, finance, and international trade that are really rich.
author: Robin Leach

quote: I don't spend much money on clothes I never did.
author: Lauren Hutton

quote: Sooner or later, we sell out for money.
author: Tony Randall

quote: If American men are obsessed with money, American women are obsessed with weight. The men talk of gain, the women talk of loss, and I do not know which talk is the more boring.
author: Marya Mannes

quote: I think that focusing on the money, on the business, is not enough.
author: Sergei Bubka

quote: You know, a lot of people are just interested in, in building a company so they can make money and get out.
author: Arthur Rock

quote: I think everything depends on money.
author: Alan Bean

quote: Art for art's sake, money for God's sake.
author: Simon Raven

quote: Business is other people's money.
author: Delphine de Girardin

quote: A fool and his money get a lot of publicity.
author: Al Bernstein

quote: Many good qualities are not sufficient to balance a single want - the want of money.
author: Johann Georg Zimmermann

quote: It's a terribly hard job to spend a billion dollars and get your money's worth.
author: George M. Humphrey

quote: A successful man is one who makes more money than his wife can spend. A successful woman is one who can find such a man.
author: Lana Turner

quote: A nation that continues year after year to spend more money on military defense than on programs of social uplift is approaching spiritual doom.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: The glow of one warm thought is to me worth more than money.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Friends and good manners will carry you where money won't go.
author: Margaret Walker

quote: The American Republic will endure until the day Congress discovers that it can bribe the public with the public's money.
author: Alexis de Tocqueville

quote: Let us more and more insist on raising funds of love, of kindness, of understanding, of peace. Money will come if we seek first the Kingdom of God - the rest will be given.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Let us not be satisfied with just giving money. Money is not enough, money can be got, but they need your hearts to love them. So, spread your love everywhere you go.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: I try to give to the poor people for love what the rich could get for money. No, I wouldn't touch a leper for a thousand pounds yet I willingly cure him for the love of God.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: We have the best government that money can buy.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I can make more generals, but horses cost money.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Rule No.1: Never lose money. Rule No.2: Never forget rule No.1.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Money isn't the most important thing in life, but it's reasonably close to oxygen on the 'gotta have it' scale.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Too many people spend money they haven't earned to buy things they don't want to impress people they don't like.
author: Will Smith

quote: I've never been able to understand why a Republican contributor is a 'fat cat' and a Democratic contributor of the same amount of money is a 'public-spirited philanthropist'.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: I can live without money, but I cannot live without love.
author: Judy Garland

quote: Never spend your money before you have earned it.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: If money help a man to do good to others, it is of some value but if not, it is simply a mass of evil, and the sooner it is got rid of, the better.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: There is only one boss. The customer. And he can fire everybody in the company from the chairman on down, simply by spending his money somewhere else.
author: Sam Walton

quote: America... just a nation of two hundred million used car salesmen with all the money we need to buy guns and no qualms about killing anybody else in the world who tries to make us uncomfortable.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: Money can't buy happiness, but it can make you awfully comfortable while you're being miserable.
author: Clare Boothe Luce

quote: Rather than love, than money, than fame, give me truth.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Money, not morality, is the principle commerce of civilized nations.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: A fool and his money are soon elected.
author: Will Rogers

quote: I don't want to make money, I just want to be wonderful.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: What's money? A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and goes to bed at night and in between does what he wants to do.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: The rich are always going to say that, you know, just give us more money and we'll go out and spend more and then it will all trickle down to the rest of you. But that has not worked the last 10 years, and I hope the American public is catching on.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: If money is your hope for independence you will never have it. The only real security that a man will have in this world is a reserve of knowledge, experience, and ability.
author: Henry Ford

quote: My favorite things in life don't cost any money. It's really clear that the most precious resource we all have is time.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: There is only one class in the community that thinks more about money than the rich, and that is the poor. The poor can think of nothing else.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Giving money and power to government is like giving whiskey and car keys to teenage boys.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Most people work just hard enough not to get fired and get paid just enough money not to quit.
author: George Carlin

quote: Government always finds a need for whatever money it gets.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: I spent three days a week for 10 years educating myself in the public library, and it's better than college. People should educate themselves - you can get a complete education for no money. At the end of 10 years, I had read every book in the library and I'd written a thousand stories.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: If you don't have integrity, you have nothing. You can't buy it. You can have all the money in the world, but if you are not a moral and ethical person, you really have nothing.
author: Henry Kravis

quote: There are three faithful friends - an old wife, an old dog, and ready money.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Time is money.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: I think the person who takes a job in order to live - that is to say, for the money - has turned himself into a slave.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Time is more value than money. You can get more money, but you cannot get more time.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Money can't buy love, but it improves your bargaining position.
author: Christopher Marlowe

quote: Do not hire a man who does your work for money, but him who does it for love of it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: A man is usually more careful of his money than he is of his principles.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Money and success don't change people they merely amplify what is already there.
author: Will Smith

quote: If you would know the value of money, go and try to borrow some.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: It is not the employer who pays the wages. Employers only handle the money. It is the customer who pays the wages.
author: Henry Ford

quote: The TV business is uglier than most things. It is normally perceived as some kind of cruel and shallow money trench through the heart of the journalism industry, a long plastic hallway where thieves and pimps run free and good men die like dogs, for no good reason.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: An actress is not a machine, but they treat you like a machine. A money machine.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Remember that credit is money.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Politics has become so expensive that it takes a lot of money even to be defeated.
author: Will Rogers

quote: The use of money is all the advantage there is in having it.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Money often costs too much.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Money won't make you happy... but everybody wants to find out for themselves.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: In general, the art of government consists of taking as much money as possible from one class of citizens to give to another.
author: Voltaire

quote: Waste your money and you're only out of money, but waste your time and you've lost a part of your life.
author: Michael LeBoeuf

quote: In any investment, you expect to have fun and make money.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: We have an obligation and a responsibility to be investing in our students and our schools. We must make sure that people who have the grades, the desire and the will, but not the money, can still get the best education possible.
author: Barack Obama

quote: Money won't buy happiness, but it will pay the salaries of a large research staff to study the problem.
author: Bill Vaughan

quote: Friendship and money: oil and water.
author: Mario Puzo

quote: Ultimately, if you can say that I'm a bad owner and we're winning championships, I can live with that. But if we're not making the playoffs and we're spending and losing money, then I have to look in the mirror and say maybe I'm not taking the necessary steps to doing what it takes to run an organization.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: When I chased after money, I never had enough. When I got my life on purpose and focused on giving of myself and everything that arrived into my life, then I was prosperous.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: I've always felt toward the slightest scene, even if all I had to do in a scene was just to come in and say, 'Hi,' that the people ought to get their money's worth and that this is an obligation of mine, to give them the best you can get from me.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: When the federal government spends more each year than it collects in tax revenues, it has three choices: It can raise taxes, print money, or borrow money. While these actions may benefit politicians, all three options are bad for average Americans.
author: Ron Paul

quote: Money won't create success, the freedom to make it will.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Run for your life from any man who tells you that money is evil. That sentence is the leper's bell of an approaching looter.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Work like you don't need the money. Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like nobody's watching.
author: Satchel Paige

quote: God wants us to prosper financially, to have plenty of money, to fulfill the destiny He has laid out for us.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: I try to treat all the money I'm making like it's the last time I'm going to make it.
author: Eminem

quote: Money is not required to buy one necessity of the soul.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Don't matter how much money you got, there's only two kinds of people: there's saved people and there's lost people.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: Because parents have power over children. They feel they have to do what their parents say. But the love of money is the root of all evil. And this is a sweet child. And to see him turn like this, this isn't him. This is not him.
author: Michael Jackson

quote: Successful people make money. It's not that people who make money become successful, but that successful people attract money. They bring success to what they do.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Instead of giving money to found colleges to promote learning, why don't they pass a constitutional amendment prohibiting anybody from learning anything? If it works as good as the Prohibition one did, why, in five years we would have the smartest race of people on earth.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Good nature is worth more than knowledge, more than money, more than honor, to the persons who possess it.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: To have done anything just for money is to have been truly idle.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: It's hard to tell with these Internet startups if they're really interested in building companies or if they're just interested in the money. I can tell you, though: If they don't really want to build a company, they won't luck into it. That's because it's so hard that if you don't have a passion, you'll give up.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Of the billionaires I have known, money just brings out the basic traits in them. If they were jerks before they had money, they are simply jerks with a billion dollars.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Lack of money is the root of all evil.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Modern poets talk against business, poor things, but all of us write for money. Beginners are subjected to trial by market.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Being good in business is the most fascinating kind of art. Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: It is a kind of spiritual snobbery that makes people think they can be happy without money.
author: Albert Camus

quote: When a man says money can do anything, that settles it: he hasn't got any.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: We are the only real aristocracy in the world: the aristocracy of money.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Don't bring your need to the marketplace, bring your skill. If you don't feel well, tell your doctor, but not the marketplace. If you need money, go to the bank, but not the marketplace.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: If I win and get the money, then the Oakland Police department is going to buy a boys' home, me a house, my family a house, and a Stop Police Brutality Center.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: I never attempt to make money on the stock market. I buy on the assumption that they could close the market the next day and not reopen it for five years.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: To give real service you must add something which cannot be bought or measured with money, and that is sincerity and integrity.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: Money is usually attracted, not pursued.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: I actually thought that it would be a little confusing during the same period of your life to be in one meeting when you're trying to make money, and then go to another meeting where you're giving it away. I mean is it gonna erode your ability, you know, to make money? Are you gonna somehow get confused about what you're trying to do?
author: Bill Gates

quote: Innovation has nothing to do with how many R amp& D dollars you have. When Apple came up with the Mac, IBM was spending at least 100 times more on R &amp D. It's not about money. It's about the people you have, how you're led, and how much you get it.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Pretty much, Apple and Dell are the only ones in this industry making money. They make it by being Wal-Mart. We make it by innovation.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: This will never be a civilized country until we spend more money for books than we do for chewing gum.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: You know, my main reaction to this money thing is that it's humorous, all the attention to it, because it's hardly the most insightful or valuable thing that's happened to me.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: What is a normal childhood? We weren't rich, we were pretty middle-class. My dad survived from job to job with him taking care of so many relatives, he couldn't save any money.
author: Charlie Sheen

quote: We need earmark reform, and when I'm President, I will go line by line to make sure that we are not spending money unwisely.
author: Barack Obama

quote: My restaurants are never opened on Thanksgiving I want my staff to spend time with their family if they can. My feeling is, if I can't figure out how to make money the rest of the year so that my workers can enjoy the holidays, then I don't deserve to be an owner.
author: Michael Symon

quote: We have the right as individuals to give away as much of our own money as we please in charity but as members of Congress we have no right to appropriate a dollar of the public money.
author: Davy Crockett

quote: I love to go to Washington - if only to be near my money.
author: Bob Hope

quote: Maturity: Be able to stick with a job until it is finished. Be able to bear an injustice without having to get even. Be able to carry money without spending it. Do your duty without being supervised.
author: Ann Landers

quote: Advertising is the art of convincing people to spend money they don't have for something they don't need.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Money doesn't talk, it swears.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: With our technology, with objects, literally three people in a garage can blow away what 200 people at Microsoft can do. Literally can blow it away. Corporate America has a need that is so huge and can save them so much money, or make them so much money, or cost them so much money if they miss it, that they are going to fuel the object revolution.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: A rich man is nothing but a poor man with money.
author: W. C. Fields

quote: This film cost $31 million. With that kind of money I could have invaded some country.
author: Clint Eastwood

quote: You use your money to buy privacy because during most of your life you aren't allowed to be normal.
author: Johnny Depp

quote: If you make any money, the government shoves you in the creek once a year with it in your pockets, and all that don't get wet you can keep.
author: Will Rogers

quote: The reason we have poverty is that we have no imagination. There are a great many people accumulating what they think is vast wealth, but it's only money... they don't know how to enjoy it, because they have no imagination.
author: Alan Watts

quote: No one in this world has ever lost money by underestimating the intelligence of the great masses of the plain people. Nor has anyone ever lost public office thereby.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: The circulation of confidence is better than the circulation of money.
author: James Madison

quote: I spent my whole life in the private sector, 25 years in the private sector. I understand that when government takes more money out of the hands of people, it makes it more difficult for them to buy things. If they can't buy things, the economy doesn't grow. If the economy doesn't grow, we don't put Americans to work.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: Disneyland is a work of love. We didn't go into Disneyland just with the idea of making money.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Let advertisers spend the same amount of money improving their product that they do on advertising and they wouldn't have to advertise it.
author: Will Rogers

quote: The highest use of capital is not to make more money, but to make money do more for the betterment of life.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Money without brains is always dangerous.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Of course, to have money is just great because you can do what you think is important to you. I always was a rich person because money's not related to happiness.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Business, that's easily defined - it's other people's money.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: No one would remember the Good Samaritan if he'd only had good intentions he had money as well.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: I'm sick of giving creeps money off my soul.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: Attitude is more important than the past, than education, than money, than circumstances, than what people do or say. It is more important than appearance, giftedness, or skill.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: Time and money spent in helping men to do more for themselves is far better than mere giving.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Money is not the only answer, but it makes a difference.
author: Barack Obama

quote: I'd say it's been my biggest problem all my life... it's money. It takes a lot of money to make these dreams come true.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Prospering just doesn't have to do with money.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: I mean, I do think at a certain point you've made enough money.
author: Barack Obama

quote: If advertisers spent the same amount of money on improving their products as they do on advertising then they wouldn't have to advertise them.
author: Will Rogers

quote: The Internet didn't get invented on its own. Government research created the Internet so that all the companies could make money off the Internet. The point is, is that when we succeed, we succeed because of our individual initiative, but also because we do things together.
author: Barack Obama

quote: Money and women are the most sought after and the least known about of any two things we have.
author: Will Rogers

quote: I think it's too bad that everybody's decided to turn on drugs, I don't think drugs are the problem. Crime is the problem. Cops are the problem. Money's the problem. But drugs are just drugs.
author: Jerry Garcia

quote: Speculation is only a word covering the making of money out of the manipulation of prices, instead of supplying goods and services.
author: Henry Ford

quote: President Obama's view of a free economy is to send your money to his friends. My vision for a free enterprise economy is to return entrepreneurship and genius and creativity to the American people!
author: Mitt Romney

quote: You reach a point where you don't work for money.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Money doesn't make you happy. I now have $50 million but I was just as happy when I had $48 million.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: A system of capitalism presumes sound money, not fiat money manipulated by a central bank. Capitalism cherishes voluntary contracts and interest rates that are determined by savings, not credit creation by a central bank.
author: Ron Paul

quote: Money demands that you sell, not your weakness to men's stupidity, but your talent to their reason.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: When it is a question of money, everybody is of the same religion.
author: Voltaire

quote: Money is like an arm or leg - use it or lose it.
author: Henry Ford

quote: I know that campaigns can seem small, and even silly. Trivial things become big distractions. Serious issues become sound bites. And the truth gets buried under an avalanche of money and advertising. If you're sick of hearing me approve this message, believe me - so am I.
author: Barack Obama

quote: You can choose a future where more Americans have the chance to gain the skills they need to compete, no matter how old they are or how much money they have. Education was the gateway to opportunity for me. It was the gateway for Michelle. And now more than ever, it is the gateway to a middle-class life.
author: Barack Obama

quote: I've never preached one sermon on money, on just finances. I want to stay away from it.
author: Joel Osteen
