quote: Movies are not scripts - movies are films they're not books, they're not the theatre.
author: Nicolas Roeg

quote: I just like movies that somehow expose the world in a way that's different than you imagine it.
author: Alex Winter

quote: I've always been an animal lover. I've grown up with dogs my whole life. I think that is what helped me get the role on 'Lassie', I was comfortable around the dog, where many of the kids were afraid or intimidated by Lassie.
author: Will Estes

quote: Sometimes in movies, I still have to be the hero, but it's not all that important to me anymore.
author: Dennis Quaid

quote: Nobody makes movies bad on purpose.
author: Roland Emmerich

quote: 'Home Alone' was a movie, not an alibi.
author: Jerry Orbach

quote: It couldn't sound like a dog, because K9 isn't a dog, but I made it sound as mechanical as possible.
author: John Leeson

quote: We are the movies and the movies are us.
author: David Ansen

quote: Everything I learned I learned from the movies.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Some of my foster families used to send me to the movies to get me out of the house and there I'd sit all day and way into the night. Up in front, there with the screen so big, a little kid all alone, and I loved it. I loved anything that moved up there and I didn't miss anything that happened and there was no popcorn either.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: My skin is hard when it comes to my music. But with my movies, I'm still a virgin in a lot of ways. I'm not used to being shot down for no reason.
author: Will Smith

quote: I think with movies I am really connecting to the Joseph Campbell idea of the collective unconscious.
author: Will Smith

quote: Over the years all these vampire movies have come out and nobody looks like a vampire anymore.
author: Johnny Depp

quote: There's a lot of great movies that have won the Academy Award, and a lot of great movies that haven't. You just do the best you can.
author: Clint Eastwood

quote: Movies are a fad. Audiences really want to see live actors on a stage.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: Advertising is a racket, like the movies and the brokerage business. You cannot be honest without admitting that its constructive contribution to humanity is exactly minus zero.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: One of my movies was called 'True Lies.' It's what the Democrats should have called their convention.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Minimalism seems closest to the sophisticated storytelling of movies. Movies have really educated contemporary audiences to be the most intelligent, sophisticated audiences in history. We don't any longer need to have the relationship between one scene and the next explained. We will figure it out ourselves.
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: And I believe that you never be limited in what you do, so I like to do movies, I like to do television.
author: Harvey Fierstein

quote: Movies are all about plot. Theater, even if it's story heavy, it's about ideas.
author: Harvey Fierstein

quote: Theater has to resonate in your heart in a way that movies don't.
author: Harvey Fierstein

quote: I was striving to be the most muscular man, and it got me into the movies. It got me everything that I have.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I love the movies, and when I go to see a movie that's been made from one of my books, I know that it isn't going to be exactly like my novel because a lot of other people have interpreted it. But I also know it has an idea that I'll like because that idea occurred to me, and I spent a year, or a year and a half of my life working on it.
author: Stephen King

quote: Somebody asked me about the current choice we're being given in the presidential election. I said, Well, it's like two of the scariest movies I can imagine.
author: Dean Koontz

quote: To me, movies and music go hand in hand. When I'm writing a script, one of the first things I do is find the music I'm going to play for the opening sequence.
author: Quentin Tarantino

quote: The only reason anyone goes to Broadway is because they can't get work in the movies.
author: Bette Davis

quote: By going to the movies, and because of other things, too, going to college, making a wide variety of friends, moving around traveling, I became a lot more open-minded than the heritage I was born into might have suggested.
author: Roger Ebert

quote: I wanted to do another movie that could make us laugh and cry and feel good about the world. I wanted to do something else that could make us smile. This is a time when we need to smile more and Hollywood movies are supposed to do that for people in difficult times.
author: Steven Spielberg

quote: When I was a boy, I always saw myself as a hero in comic books and in movies. I grew up believing this dream.
author: Elvis Presley

quote: So, one way or another, I found myself in a few movies. I take it seriously when I'm on the set, but I don't take myself seriously as an actor.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: Movies always are open to being remade because times change so much, and the tempo of movies changes. I think of it like a James Bond. They can have different actors play the same role... I've had people come up to me and say, 'We want to remake 'The Jerk' with so and so.' And I say, 'Fine.' It just doesn't bother me. It's an honor actually.
author: Steve Martin

quote: I realized this is what God has dealt me, and I should be thankful considering all that's happened to me in my life, but MS caused the movies to stop - stop dead - and I miss it.
author: Richard Pryor

quote: My mom took me to see Carnal Knowledge and The Wild Bunch and all these kind of movies when I was a kid.
author: Quentin Tarantino

quote: Movies are not about the weekend that they're released, and in the grand scheme of things, that's probably the most unimportant time of a film's life.
author: Quentin Tarantino

quote: I'm not a Hollywood basher because enough good movies come out of the Hollywood system every year to justify its existence, without any apologies.
author: Quentin Tarantino

quote: Movies are my religion and God is my patron. I'm lucky enough to be in the position where I don't make movies to pay for my pool. When I make a movie, I want it to be everything to me like I would die for it.
author: Quentin Tarantino

quote: If you just love movies enough, you can make a good one.
author: Quentin Tarantino

quote: All my movies are achingly personal.
author: Quentin Tarantino

quote: I have loved movies as the number one thing in my life so long that I can't ever remember a time when I didn't.
author: Quentin Tarantino

quote: I just grew up watching a lot of movies. I'm attracted to this genre and that genre, this type of story, and that type of story. As I watch movies I make some version of it in my head that isn't quite what I'm seeing - taking the things I like and mixing them with stuff I've never seen before.
author: Quentin Tarantino

quote: Some mornings you wake up and think, gee I look handsome today. Other days I think, what am I doing in the movies? I wanna go back to Ireland and drive a forklift.
author: Liam Neeson

quote: I don't really have a schedule of when I want to show my children my movies.
author: Steven Spielberg

quote: I was making a lot of 8mm home movies, since I was twelve, making little dramas and comedies with the neighborhood kids.
author: Steven Spielberg

quote: Sexiness, particularly in movies, is the chess game in the 'Thomas Crown Affair'. It's, it's, I don't know, but Faye Dunaway comes up a lot in that thinking. It's the subtlety of sexiness. The moment you try to be sexy, then it's not.
author: Daniel Craig

quote: I didn't grow up thinking of movies as film, or art, but as movies, something to do on a Saturday afternoon.
author: Sydney Pollack

quote: I have been pregnant in so many movies it's ridiculous.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: There are a lot of movies that are unbelievable successes that I would be mortified to be a part of.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: My nominee for Best Picture of the year - maybe the best picture ever, because it's essentially made up of and is an ecstatic love letter to all other movies - is Christian Marclay's endlessly enticing must-see masterpiece 'The Clock.'
author: Jerry Saltz

quote: I am in so many movies that are on TV at 2:00 a.m. that people think I am dead.
author: Michael Caine

quote: I've been really enjoying writing articles and writing music and music for movies.
author: Alanis Morissette

quote: I worked very hard on those movies but there was some creative connection that wasn't being made.
author: Michael J. Fox

quote: I can be in 20 movies. But I'll never be an actor.
author: Jon Stewart

quote: My dream role would probably be a psycho killer, because the whole thing I love about movies is that you get to do things you could never do in real life, and that would be my way of vicariously experiencing being a psycho killer. Also, it's incredibly romantic.
author: Christina Ricci

quote: In life and in movies, it's a similar challenge, where you have expectations, and you end up in situations that are not meeting your expectations.
author: Jeff Bridges

quote: Sex is a doorway to something so powerful and mystical, but movies usually depict it in a completely flat way.
author: David Lynch

quote: Right now, my job is that I'm like an ambulance chaser. I've got to look for movies with white guys falling out of them.
author: Chris Rock

quote: Movies have takes. But plays are like life - you don't really get takes.
author: Chris Rock

quote: Dude, I didn't say Jude Law can't act. I didn't say Jude Law was in bad movies. I just said he's in every movie.
author: Chris Rock

quote: My movies are okay, but they're not my specials.
author: Chris Rock

quote: I'm not bragging but my movies have grossed well over a billion dollars.
author: Steve Guttenberg

quote: I'm obsessed with zombies. I like watching zombie movies and I read zombie books.
author: Kevin Bacon

quote: Not only do I have to live, right, I have to get some cash for my troubles - it's a scary thing, and people need to start to think about the messages that they send in the movies.
author: Morgan Freeman

quote: Movies are like magic tricks.
author: Jeff Bridges

quote: I'd maybe done about 12 movies when I decided that this was what I was going to do.
author: Jeff Bridges

quote: I'm used to watching old movies of myself.
author: Jeff Bridges

quote: Movies are very subjective.
author: Jeff Bridges

quote: Normally, I love to go to the movies and when I see a character portrayed by different actors at different ages, it kind of pops a little bit for me. It brings me out of the movie experience. Now we have the technology to cure that.
author: Jeff Bridges

quote: I'm very much into the costuming of any character that I portray and it's one of the great things about making movies is it's a collaborative art form so you get all these artists who are looking specifically about for this instance your character's costume and what that might tell about your character.
author: Jeff Bridges

quote: I think there's a real joy in going to see movies when you discover them yourself.
author: Jeff Bridges

quote: Nowadays it seems more and more like the 'business' in 'show business' is underlined, and there are campaigns, and it's all part of getting people in to see the movies.
author: Jeff Bridges

quote: Even in India the Hindi film industry might be the best known but there are movies made in other regional languages in India, be it Tamil or Bengali. Those experiences too are different from the ones in Bombay.
author: Aishwarya Rai

quote: I remember being on film sets when I was younger, and only men got to do the cool action movies. So I thought, 'Maybe I'll get to produce one day and get to do cool stuff too,' which is what happened when we did 'Charlie's Angels.' Starting my production company was a big turning point for me.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: Becoming emancipated at 14, my life wasn't normal. I didn't have to go to school, so I didn't. I was rebellious by nature. I spent my 20s focusing on my company, Flower Films, and producing movies. Now that I'm almost 30, I would like to try other things in lie. I'm crazy about photography, and I want to take an art history class.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: I love doing normal things - movies, shopping, going out with friends, writing, reading, taking hot bubble baths - that's a big one for relaxation. I also love to go to art and history museums.
author: Christina Aguilera

quote: You know, I think the film business is its own worst enemy because it sells movies on DVD footage and 'behind the scenes,' and now it's a real struggle trying to keep storylines and plotlines a secret.
author: Daniel Craig

quote: Later on they send me to Hollywood. To make movies. It was all new to me. I was only 21 years old.
author: Elvis Presley

quote: The next thing I knew, I was out of the service and making movies again. My first picture was called, GI Blues. I thought I was still in the army.
author: Elvis Presley

quote: If there's specific resistance to women making movies, I just choose to ignore that as an obstacle for two reasons: I can't change my gender, and I refuse to stop making movies.
author: Kathryn Bigelow

quote: Everyone related to me in my circle was from church: church friends, church school, church activities. All my friends weren't allowed to watch MTV or go to PG-13 movies or listen to the radio, so I didn't really know anything different. That's how I was raised.
author: Katy Perry

quote: My whole life has been movies and religion. That's it. Nothing else.
author: Martin Scorsese

quote: Very often I've known people who wouldn't say a word to each other, but they'd go to see movies together and experience life that way.
author: Martin Scorsese

quote: I've seen many, many movies over the years, and there are only a few that suddenly inspire you so much that you want to continue to make films.
author: Martin Scorsese

quote: I think less is more when it comes to kissing in the movies.
author: Julia Roberts

quote: I'm doing 'Les Miserables,' the movie. I've done a lot of musicals and a lot of movies, and I know there are not a lot of people in Hollywood who have been down those two paths so I've been like, 'Come on, let's do a movie/musical.'
author: Hugh Jackman

quote: I have done many movies that people hadn't seen. 'The Fountain,' I spent a year on that. 'The Prestige' with Chris Nolan, and 'Australia.' From my perspective it's very satisfying. Some movies people see and other movies they don't. 'Wolverine,' 'X Men,' I know that in some level people know me just for that and it's fine for me.
author: Hugh Jackman

quote: The best movies are simple.
author: Shia LaBeouf

quote: Nobody makes movies like Oliver Stone.
author: Shia LaBeouf

quote: I'm not a strikingly handsome guy, but I'm in movies.
author: Shia LaBeouf

quote: I was always raised on cowboy films, and then when I could start making choices about the movies I wanted to watch I found myself wanting to watch gangster films which were slightly more sophisticated than the baseline stuff that was in westerns.
author: Shia LaBeouf

quote: Basically, there's not enough sex in movies, that's it. I'm trying to say it, people. I miss sex in movies because sex is natural, guns are not.
author: Zoe Saldana

quote: You know those movies where the people in the audience are screaming, 'Don't go in that door!' because you know the killer is there? Well, it is the same thing with this debt. We know how this ends.
author: Marco Rubio

quote: I sure lost my musical direction in Hollywood. My songs were the same conveyer belt mass production, just like most of my movies were.
author: Elvis Presley

quote: Those movies sure got me into a rut.
author: Elvis Presley

quote: Too much TV hurts movies.
author: Elvis Presley

quote: Funny things happen to you in movies for silly reasons.
author: Michael Caine

quote: January is the garbage can of movies in America, directly after all the Oscar contenders have been out.
author: Michael Caine

quote: My wife comes with me on all the movies, but she is not an appendage to a film star or anything like that. She is a completely intertwined partner. She is the other half of me. Also, we're still very much in love with each other. We always have been, we always will be.
author: Michael Caine

quote: My mother had to send me to the movies with my birth certificate, so that I wouldn't have to pay the extra fifty cents that the adults had to pay.
author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quote: I don't know what it was, maybe the movie theaters in my immediate surrounding neighbourhood in Burbank, but I never saw what would be considered A movies.
author: Tim Burton

quote: I never really got nightmares from movies. In fact, I recall my father saying when I was three years old that I would be scared, but I never was.
author: Tim Burton

quote: I don't want to criticize any other designers, but I have to say that many of the people involved in this industry - directors and producers - are trying to make their games more like movies. They are longing to make movies rather than making videogames.
author: Shigeru Miyamoto

quote: Even the worst Bond movies, there's something to love about them.
author: Daniel Craig

quote: I see a lot of movies. I love films as a spectator, and that's never obscured by the part of me that does the work myself. I just love going to the movies.
author: Daniel Day-Lewis

quote: Where I come from, it was a heresy to say you wanted to be in movies, leave alone American movies.
author: Daniel Day-Lewis

quote: My children have never watched any of my films. Charlie knows that daddy makes movies, but he says they are not good enough for him to watch.
author: Russell Crowe

quote: I'm not an admirer of action movies. I just think, Oh my God, it must be so tiring.
author: Catherine Deneuve

quote: How do people relate to movies now, when they're on portable devices or streaming them? It's not as much about going to the movies. That experience has changed.
author: Keanu Reeves

quote: Economically, it's more expensive to make movies. I hope digital movies change that.
author: Ang Lee

quote: In life, single women are the most vulnerable adults. In movies, they are given imaginary power.
author: Elizabeth Wurtzel

quote: I still like the run and gun action movies and how truly dangerous it can be to make these films.
author: Megan Fox

quote: When I was a little boy I used to borrow my father's hat, and make a press card to stick in the hat band. That was the way reporters were always portrayed in the movies.
author: Charles Kuralt

quote: Frankly, I got into the movies because I like the movies a lot.
author: Jack Nicholson

quote: I really don't have favorites I'm just a fan of movies, period.
author: Michael Clarke Duncan

quote: Hollywood is throwing action movies at me.
author: Liam Neeson

quote: I had done some flimflam movies, but I didn't understand what being an actor meant anymore.
author: Liam Neeson

quote: Before 'Schindler's List,' I wouldn't have believed movies had a lot of power for social change.
author: Liam Neeson

quote: A lot of the struggle I had with movies is I really loved moments and tones and feelings in a scene, and I loved creating those, but I never really had great stories to string them together.
author: Louis C. K.

quote: You take somebody that cries their goddam eyes out over phoney stuff in the movies, and nine times out of ten they're mean bastards at heart.
author: J. D. Salinger

quote: Sure, 'Twilight' is really huge right now and everybody's freaking out over it, but it will go away soon and I will be back to doing what I'm used to doing: weird little movies that nobody sees.
author: Kristen Stewart

quote: I go to the movies a lot, and I regret when I see some actor that I used to like, to find them offering no more surprises.
author: Catherine Deneuve

quote: I live very normally, I go out with my friends, we go to the movies, I queue, we go to restaurants.
author: Catherine Deneuve

quote: Bruce Lee was very famous. I watched his movies and he is amazing. He is a martial arts master, his philosophy, his movement, both physically and mentally, were very strong.
author: Jet Li

quote: When we talk about how movies used to be made, it was over 100 years of film, literal, physical film, with emulsion, that we would expose to light and we would get pictures.
author: Keanu Reeves

quote: The whole world loves American movies, blue jeans, jazz and rock and roll. It is probably a better way to get to know our country than by what politicians or airline commercials represent.
author: Billy Joel

quote: In the past I've made movies that were pretty universally liked. You can't really hate them. You can discard them, but you can't really hate them.
author: Ang Lee

quote: I look at American movies, the big muscles, and try to apply that to Chinese film-making.
author: Ang Lee

quote: I have a lot of repression. So repression is what I make movies about.
author: Ang Lee

quote: I think a lot of people do big movies not because they are talented artists but because they can function in the circumstances.
author: Ang Lee

quote: Thinking back to those earlier days, I felt I was weak when I wasn't making movies, and then when I was, I thought I was weak as a family member.
author: Ang Lee

quote: Making movies is a way of understanding myself and the world.
author: Ang Lee

quote: After making several tragic movies in a row, I was looking to do a comedy, and one without cynicism.
author: Ang Lee

quote: 3D is quite a lot more advanced in animated movies for live-action movies we're just taking baby steps, we're just in the beginning.
author: Ang Lee

quote: I have a very busy life, and not many people who have a career and four kids go out a lot to the movies.
author: Meryl Streep

quote: I knew that there were black people in Africa, of course, unfortunately because of movies such as 'Tarzan.'
author: Henry Louis Gates

quote: My family and our neighbors and friends thought of Africa and its Africans as extensions of the stereotyped characters that we saw in movies and on television in films such as 'Tarzan' and in programs such as 'Ramar of the Jungle' and 'Sheena, Queen of the Jungle.'
author: Henry Louis Gates

quote: I like to hang out with my friends. I love music. I like to go to the movies. I like to eat. I like to cook.
author: Joan Jett

quote: I think that's what distinguishes Schmidt, really. In the movies now, so much of what is appealing to an audience is the dramatic or has to do with science fiction, and Schmidt is simply human. There's no melodrama there's no device, It's just about a human being.
author: Jack Nicholson

quote: Movies make you immortal and ageless.
author: Kristin Scott Thomas

quote: I grew up watching all these crazy movies, European movies and stuff, and I guess that I always laughed at things that were a little more offbeat.
author: Louis C. K.

quote: I don't like comedy. I like funny things. I don't like comedy. Like, comedy movies are just, 'Oh Jesus.'
author: Louis C. K.

quote: For me the greatest source of income is still movies. Nothing - stocks, financial speculation, real estate speculation or businesses - makes more money for me than making movies.
author: Jackie Chan

quote: I will make action movies, I think, for a few more years, another five years.
author: Jackie Chan

quote: Sometimes when we weep in the movies we weep for ourselves or for a life unlived. Or we even go to the movies because we want to resist the emotion that's there in front of us. I think there is always a catharsis that I look for and that makes the movie experience worthwhile.
author: Edward Zwick

quote: If people are constantly reading about you, and you're overexposed, they've got no reason to go see your movies. Also, it's not pleasant or nice to have your privacy invaded.
author: John Cusack

quote: I think it's better to be involved in one or two movies a year.
author: Eric Cantona

quote: They say I can open movies, and that's nice in that it puts into people's minds that women can do it. It's not just Kevin Costner, not just Arnold Schwarzenegger. Not just the guys.
author: Julia Roberts

quote: Making movies is not rocket science. It's about relationships and communication and strangers coming together to see if they can get along harmoniously, productively, and creatively. That's a challenge. When it works, it's fantastic and will lift you up. When it doesn't work, it's almost just as fascinating.
author: Julia Roberts

quote: I've made so many movies playing a hooker that they don't pay me in the regular way anymore. They leave it on the dresser.
author: Shirley MacLaine

quote: And what I like about it is it makes me happy and I think it makes a lot of people happy to go to the movies and to not think about the problems of the day or the problems of tomorrow or the yesterday and just go on for the ride and have the fun of losing oneself in a fantasy.
author: Nicolas Cage

quote: Now on Friday nights, if I want to go hang out with friends, I go hang out with friends. If I want to stay in and be in the hot tub and have people over to watch movies, I do that.
author: Demi Lovato

quote: I've had some movies that have been ridiculed, but that's OK with me. I don't feel that really defines me. Should I change who I am to be popular?
author: Kevin Costner

quote: I wasn't allowed to go to movies when I was kid my father was a minister. 101 Dalmatians and King of Kings, that was the extent of it.
author: Denzel Washington

quote: I don't want to make movies for kids, and I don't want to make movies for adults either.
author: Kristen Stewart

quote: Robots have a rich and storied history in movies.
author: John Podhoretz

quote: What people adore about superhero movies is the signal quality of the Christopher Nolan films - their complete lack of irony when it comes to the portrayal of heroism and the need for heroes to confront evil.
author: John Podhoretz

quote: Well, everyone likes movies when they're a little kid.
author: Anthony Hopkins

quote: I made two movies before The Police had a hit record: I did Quadrophenia and a film called Radio On.
author: Sting

quote: I have realized that I hate going to the premieres of the movies that I'm in. Because I feel this tension after the movie is over that everyone feels obligated to say something nice to you. It's so unnatural and uncomfortable.
author: Amanda Seyfried

quote: I do love the films I've done in the past. I work hard in my movies and my friends work hard and we're trying to make people laugh and I'm very proud of that.
author: Adam Sandler

quote: I played Winnie Cooper on 'The Wonder Years' from ages 12-18, and did a few other movies during some of the summers.
author: Danica McKellar

quote: I used to love to go to the movies - I'd see two in a row. A few times I even snuck into the second movie after it started... now that I think about it, that's kind of like shoplifting! Needless to say, I still love going to the movies, but I don't sneak in anymore.
author: Danica McKellar

quote: Even when I was a little kid, I always said I would be in the movies one day, and damned if I didn't make it.
author: Richard Pryor

quote: I really like children to watch my movies.
author: Jackie Chan

quote: I've choreographed all of my movies.
author: Jackie Chan

quote: When I got depressed, I watched Bruce Lee movies. I learned everything from Bruce Lee.
author: Jackie Chan

quote: Most of the time it's the role. Sometimes it's the story and sometimes it just the paycheck. It's the little movies that come out as stories or the fact that I have work to go out, you know what I'm saying, you can only be out so long without work, you start getting antsy.
author: Morgan Freeman

quote: It can have an enormous effect because big budget movies can have big budget perks, and small budget movies have no perks, but what is the driving force, of course, is the script, and your part in it.
author: Morgan Freeman

quote: People need to start to think about the messages that they send in the movies.
author: Morgan Freeman

quote: Any time you stop looking at evil as a black and white thing, it's helpful. So the fact that there won't be any obligatory Islamic terrorist stereotypes in movies any more, that'd be helpful.
author: John Cusack

quote: The movies I made early on may not have been great, but they were all commercially successful.
author: Christina Ricci

quote: Movies such as 'Mr. Smith Goes to Washington' in 1939 to 'Dave' in 1993 portray Washington leaders as the ultimate Everymen - decent people just like you and me, only thrust onto greatness.
author: Ron Fournier

quote: I do not quote my own movies. I think I would be pretty insufferable if I did.
author: Diablo Cody

quote: People don't have these tidy little redemption arcs in reality the way they do in movies.
author: Diablo Cody

quote: I'm not an especially highbrow person, but I have always loved small, quirky, edgy movies.
author: Diablo Cody

quote: I don't know why, but I've always been a sucker for roller coasters in movies.
author: Diablo Cody

quote: Oh, I adored Mickey Mouse when I was a child. He was the emblem of happiness and funniness. You went to the movies then, you saw two movies and a short. When Mickey Mouse came on the screen and there was his big head, my sister said she had to hold onto me. I went berserk.
author: Maurice Sendak

quote: Going to the movies was a big event in my youth. My father would be the initiator - he'd have me put on a jacket to see a film.
author: Ralph Fiennes

quote: You can't work in the movies. Movies are all about lighting. Very few filmmakers will concentrate on the story. You get very little rehearsal time, so anything you do onscreen is a kind of speed painting.
author: John Malkovich

quote: I like very much to do movies.
author: John Malkovich

quote: I like to direct movies, but I don't like to goof around for eight years talking about it.
author: John Malkovich

quote: Quite often - a lot of the work I had done had been extensively with women. Most especially in the theater, but also quite often in the movies. That has its own delights, and maybe pitfalls too.
author: John Malkovich

quote: You have to read scripts and audition and develop relationships. It takes a long time to develop a body of work but over the last 25 years I guess I've done that many movies. In hindsight it may seem effortless, but there's a lot of work that goes into it.
author: Harry Connick, Jr.

quote: More and more major businesses and industries are being run on software and delivered as online services - from movies to agriculture to national defense.
author: Marc Andreessen

quote: Steven Spielberg is unique. I feel that the kinds of movies he loves are the same kinds of movies that the big mass audience loves. He's very fortunate because he can do the things he naturally likes the best, and he's been very successful.
author: Francis Ford Coppola

quote: When newspapers started to publish the box office scores of movies, I was horrified. Those results are totally fake because they never include the promotion budget.
author: Francis Ford Coppola

quote: I wanted to write and direct movies and not be forced to adapt them from a bestselling book.
author: Francis Ford Coppola

quote: I'm no longer dependent on the movie business to make a living. So if I want to make movies as other old guys would play golf, I can.
author: Francis Ford Coppola

quote: I've been offered lots of movies. There's always some actor who's doing a project and would like to have me do it. But you look at the project and think, 'Gee, there are a lot of good directors who could do that.' I'd like to do something only I can do.
author: Francis Ford Coppola

quote: People feel the worst film I made was 'Jack.' But to this day, when I get checks from old movies I've made, 'Jack' is one of the biggest ones. No one knows that. If people hate the movie, they hate the movie. I just wanted to work with Robin Williams.
author: Francis Ford Coppola

quote: I'm not mad about movies, there are too many people involved in the making of them, and they lack a definitive creative focus.
author: David Bailey

quote: I had to act in a school play when I was about ten years old. I really didn't want to do it. But everyone had to do it so I didn't have a choice. A talent agent came and watched it and later gave me some work. It's funny because I'd always known that I wanted a movie career. I just didn't think that I would be in the movies.
author: Kristen Stewart

quote: I like being in movies that have a great story. I'm not so interested in being a Hollywood star. It's a job, you know. When you wake up at six in the morning every day for a week, it feels like hard work.
author: Kristen Stewart

quote: I mean, I love L.A. - I love living here. But I wish that we could make things without the need to hit a home run every single time. It's a unique thing to Hollywood that if you don't do that every time, then you're considered a failure. But it's like, 'Well, are you making movies to be successful? Or are you making movies to learn something?'
author: Kristen Stewart

quote: It's not like I sit around watching my movies again and again, but I've never quite believed actors when they say they don't watch themselves.
author: Kristen Stewart

quote: It's a funny thing: You want so badly for people to see what you do - you're proud of it - and I like the effect that movies have on people. But the attention can also make me uncomfortable.
author: Kristen Stewart

quote: Very often when I go in to meet for movies or pilots, I'm put on videotape. I hate the notion that that tape is going to sit on a shelf and never get better.
author: David Ogden Stiers

quote: I love movies that make me cry, because they're tapping into a real emotion in me, and I always think afterwards: how did they do that?
author: John Lasseter

quote: The reason I chose the movies that I did was based on where they were being filmed.
author: Meryl Streep

quote: I mean, why am I considered an 'it girl?' Because I'm in a lot of movies right now or am on the covers of magazines? I just hope there is something solid behind that. Because here's the thing with 'it girl' status. It's great and amazing that anybody is saying that at all. But how long does that last?
author: Amanda Seyfried

quote: It's like why people read scary books or go see scary movies. Because it creates a distance. They're scared, but they're not going to get hurt.
author: Vincent D'Onofrio

quote: I wanted to be in Jim Carrey comedy movies before I met him. I wanted to be a comedian on Stage 19, yukking it up.
author: Jenny McCarthy

quote: I wouldn't like to be in movies. Movie people are strange. They live a different life than musicians do.
author: Stevie Nicks

quote: I love scary movies. I like blood and gore, and I love Halloween movies.
author: Carrie Underwood

quote: My movies just kind of sneak up on you. I don't have to worry too much about what everybody is going to say. Anyway, I really don't pay attention to what the world says about my movies. I just care about what my buddies think.
author: Adam Sandler

quote: I'm not looking to get away from anything. I like what I've done. I like what I get to do and I enjoy working with my friends. I loved those movies, but this is incredible.
author: Adam Sandler

quote: Kids end up seeing my movies anyway but some of the mothers get mad at me so I figured I'd make one that I can't get yelled at for.
author: Adam Sandler

quote: I like movies I can relate to.
author: Kim Cattrall

quote: I don't know many women who can relate to Sharon Stone and the kind of movies she does. I don't know a lot of guys who can relate to Tom Cruise's movies because they're on a kind of fantastic level.
author: Kim Cattrall

quote: There are some movies that I would like to forget, for the rest of my life. But even those movies teach me things.
author: Antonio Banderas

quote: I feel like a lot of the female relationships I see on TV or in movies are in some way free of the kind of jealousy and anxiety and posturing that has been such a huge part of my female friendships, which I hope lessens a little bit with age.
author: Lena Dunham

quote: I spent all my time on my movies worried that people were eating and that the schedule was being kept, so to have experts in those areas giving me the brain space as a writer and director is huge.
author: Lena Dunham

quote: Movies are movies, and I don't think any of them are going to hurt the moral fiber of America and all that nonsense.
author: Richard Pryor

quote: I like the George Romero films, which were really great, social satire movies really twisted.
author: John Cusack

quote: I love these movies where it's just about the film. You don't have my face on the poster. It's all about the movie. I like that.
author: John Cusack

quote: It seems to me that one thing people do over and over again is try to figure out how to get married, stay married, fall in love, how to rekindle all this stuff. It seems to me to be a pretty eternal theme so I don't know if you can get typecast from making movies about men relating to women. It seems to be what is going on on the planet a lot.
author: John Cusack

quote: The movies have got more corporate, they're making fewer movies in general, and those they are making are all $200-$300m tent-pole releases that eat up all the oxygen.
author: John Cusack

quote: Usually I do everything reverse. I practice something in movies and then I try it in real life.
author: John Cusack

quote: I don't want to produce anymore small or independent movies because it's just too hard these days.
author: John Cusack

quote: I was never into the popular school or clique or anything. Then I started doing movies when I was in high school, so then I got popular. Then the girls paid attention to you who didn't before.
author: John Cusack

quote: My dad had a commercial film company, so he had a videotape player before anyone. So he got Mel Brooks movies or Citizen Kane or some classic old movies. And every summer the revival house in Evanston would show the great films from the '50s and '60s and '70s.
author: John Cusack

quote: I think being self-referential is really narcissistic. Who's to say anybody's even thinking of you that much? But some of these movies that I've done, people still recite lines to me, even 20 years later.
author: John Cusack

quote: It's like those high-school yearbook photos that everyone would rather not see: Oh my God, look at that mullet hair. I have those photos too, but for me, they're, like, entire movies. And they show them on cable.
author: John Cusack

quote: Most movies, once the action starts there's no more characters. You say a couple of dumb lines and then there's just explosions until the end.
author: John Cusack

quote: Being alone is scarier than any boogey man and the reason why I don't choose to see Horror movies as a rule.
author: Tom Sizemore

quote: You go back to those films of the '40s and '50s and hear the dialogue, the way the people played off each other - the wordplay. I think we've really lost that in movies.
author: Clive Owen

quote: I go off and make movies I come home, and I'm a dad and I hang with my girls.
author: Clive Owen

quote: The financial implode is bound to be reflected in the movies that are being made, there's no question.
author: Clive Owen

quote: A huge part of acting in movies is appetite. You do your best work when you've got a lot of appetite and you really want to embrace something. When you get tired, you don't have that hunger.
author: Clive Owen

quote: Obviously, I'm attracted to heavier movies.
author: Clive Owen

quote: I want to be in movies that stand the test of time.
author: Clive Owen

quote: Ultimately, to have a career in movies, to a certain extent, certainly in England, you can't sustain a career in just English movies.
author: Clive Owen

quote: A lot of times you get credit for stuff in your movies you didn't intend to be there.
author: Spike Lee

quote: In the Rodgers and Hammerstein generation, popular hits came out of shows and movies.
author: Stephen Sondheim

quote: You're creating new things in movies and people are going to steal them.
author: Daniel Craig

quote: When you're making movies you've got to get obsessive.
author: Daniel Craig

quote: I guess you could say I've been in my share of violent movies.
author: Daniel Craig

quote: I was sick and tired of being an English actor who did a lot of American movies because I was cheap and good.
author: Daniel Craig

quote: I always wanted to make movies.
author: Daniel Craig

quote: If I wanted to make spy movies for the rest of my life, that would be one thing, but I don't want to just make spy movies.
author: Daniel Craig

quote: Some people think literature is high culture and that it should only have a small readership. I don't think so... I have to compete with popular culture, including TV, magazines, movies and video games.
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: It's the contemporary woman that movies don't know what to do with, other than bathe her in a bridal glow in romantic comedies where both the romance and the comedy are artificial sweeteners.
author: James Wolcott

quote: People talk about mumblecore but I prefer bumblecore, hyper-realistic bee movies about how bees really are.
author: Mindy Kaling

quote: I have a great job writing for 'The Office,' but, really, all television writers do is dream of one day writing movies. I'll put it this way: At the Oscars the most famous person in the room is, like, Angelina Jolie. At the Emmys the huge exciting celebrity is Bethenny Frankel. You get what I mean.
author: Mindy Kaling

quote: Woody Allen is really the ultimate. I love that he believed in himself enough to do what he did. And I have that same feeling - that there's nobody that looks like me in movies, nobody would cast me as a romantic lead, but I want to do it and I feel confident that I can.
author: Mindy Kaling

quote: I think these movies are as much for people of that time as for people who weren't born. For people who weren't born, they see how leaders must act under a crisis situation, not trying to be re-elected or not trying to check polls, that they go from their gut check.
author: Kevin Costner

quote: I'm not a film buff. I don't watch a lot of movies.
author: Denzel Washington

quote: Growing up I didn't watch movies.
author: Denzel Washington

quote: It's simple: You get a part. You play a part. You play it well. You do your work and you go home. And what is wonderful about movies is that once they're done, they belong to the people. Once you make it, it's what they see. That's where my head is at.
author: Denzel Washington

quote: I tend to think of action movies as exuberant morality plays in which good triumphs over evil.
author: Sylvester Stallone

quote: I made some truly awful movies. 'Stop! Or My Mom Will Shoot' was the worst. If you ever want someone to confess to murder just make him or her sit through that film. They will confess to anything after 15 minutes.
author: Sylvester Stallone

quote: Now, if you are like me - if you are like practically anybody in America - then you probably hold some negative opinions about the French, based upon movies, rumors, recent headlines, unfortunate run-ins with Parisian waiters, or... you know... all that unpleasantness surrounding the Vichy regime.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: Movies were never an art form, they were entertainment. It just evolved into an art form from there, and it's still evolving in different ways.
author: David Mamet

quote: I'm not impressed by someone's degree... I'm impressed by them making movies.
author: Richard King

quote: I love horror, I love scary movies, I love thrillers. If things creep you out and spook you? I love it.
author: Lana Parrilla

quote: Although charismatic, James Dean is no Harrison Ford. In the majority of his movies, sooner or later he got the crap beaten out of him.
author: Dean Koontz

quote: I think we're very complicated and we're capable of all kinds of things, and movies don't reflect that.
author: Ryan Gosling

quote: I think it's more interesting to see people who don't feel appropriately. I relate to that, because sometimes I don't feel anything at all for things I'm supposed to, and other times I feel too much. It's not always like it is in the movies.
author: Ryan Gosling

quote: A lot of action movies today seem to have scenes that just lead up to the action.
author: Jason Statham

quote: How many movies do you see when you can say this director really knew what film he wanted to make? I can count them on the fingers of one hand.
author: Gary Oldman

quote: I have three kids who like Harry Potter so I was sort of aware of it. You can't really move from it: it's on buses, in stores, it's everywhere. One of my kids has read the books the other two are too small but they like the movies.
author: Gary Oldman

quote: The movies I watch and the music I listen to and the books I read - those are important to me. It's very important to me, and I don't know what I would do without those things.
author: Joseph Gordon-Levitt

quote: We can now have action movies with two stars where one might be African American and one might be Asian American. One of them doesn't have to be white, and the other one doesn't have to be the ethnic sidekick. We're way over that. And I think it's happening in society, too.
author: Roger Ebert

quote: I just knew that was what I wanted to do. I was going to perform as a singer I was going to perform as a dancer, and I was, you know, going to do movies and be an actress. I was going to do it or die trying. That's what my life was.
author: Jennifer Lopez

quote: I feel I want to grow as an actress and be better. I want to progress as a singer and songwriter, and produce movies and everything. So there'll be no time when I feel I've done it all.
author: Jennifer Lopez

quote: No, but way before that, I've been doing little dances in movies for years. Yeah, that was an amazing chance. You know, at my age to be able to do a music dance video, very unusual.
author: Christopher Walken

quote: I've made movies that we're very successful that we're a complete surprise, and I've made movies that I thought we're going to be very successful that, you know.
author: Christopher Walken

quote: My favorite characters are the ones that are the most successful movies.
author: Christopher Walken

quote: I think that if I had grown up and had been in show business and the movies twenty five, thirty years earlier, I think I would have made a lot more musical movies.
author: Christopher Walken

quote: I've made three musical movies which is pretty good considering that not many are made but I was lucky in other ways. I came along when independent movies were starting to boom.
author: Christopher Walken

quote: When videotape came so a lot of movies that I do have a kind of afterlife in video. Things where movies that I do would come and go they still come and go but you can go rent them and see them on TV.
author: Christopher Walken

quote: I think if you do something effectively whether you're the lover or the comic or the action guy or the villain like I play movies are very expensive to make. Chances are you'll get asked to play that part again.
author: Christopher Walken

quote: I have been in movies that I thought I wasn't very good in.
author: Christopher Walken

quote: I make movies that nobody will see. I've made movies that even I have never seen.
author: Christopher Walken

quote: I used to be prettier than I am, but I think I look better now. I was a pretty boy. Particularly in my early movies. I don't like looking at them so much. There's a sort of pretty thing about me.
author: Christopher Walken

quote: I've made movies that I thought were good. I've made movies that I thought were okay, but then I was very good. And sometimes you're in a movie and you think, I wish more people saw that - because you're good. And it just works out that the movie gets lost. But that's show business.
author: Christopher Walken

quote: I aim for a lifetime full of movies.
author: Salma Hayek

quote: I don't know why I don't watch a lot of movies I can barely keep up with the things my friends are in. There isn't enough time in life.
author: Meryl Streep

quote: It was like in Samoa when they'd put up a movie screen on the beach and show movies and the locals would run behind the sheet to see where the people went. It was pretty grim.
author: Dick Wolf

quote: And being as I'm somebody who loves movies like The Machinist, I also love going along to big mass entertainment movies. I get in the mood for all kinds of movies, and so I like to try each of them.
author: Christian Bale

quote: In terms of the romantic kind of lead, I just never enjoy those movies very much. Maybe they'll come to interest me more as I get older. I doubt it, but maybe. Romantic comedies tend to be, for me, an oxymoron.
author: Christian Bale

quote: There are movies that require fantasy and slightly more fantastical acting. Lines that are good for certain movies, in real life circumstances, would be absolutely unbelievable things to really say, and you would look at these people like they're freaks for conversing that way. But somehow for certain styles of movies, it works, and it seems fine.
author: Christian Bale

quote: I like the idea of movies having a magic element. How many times have you seen an actor in a movie who you know only as the character? It's wonderful, isn't it?
author: Christian Bale

quote: I don't get it when you get so much openness about the way movies are made, and the special effects and the behind-the-scenes stuff and all of that. I can't help but feel like this reduces it a little bit.
author: Christian Bale

quote: I always leave that for other people to decide, because some of the things I consider to be disasters are some people's favorite movies. And that's what I like so much, is that you never know. Something intrigues somebody and means nothing to somebody else.
author: Christian Bale

quote: I'm so grateful for what Disney gave me and the experiences that I got, but at the end of the day, I can do so much more than what I did on that channel and in those movies.
author: Ashley Tisdale

quote: I can't watch scary movies right now, because living on my own, it kind of freaks me out.
author: Ashley Tisdale

quote: Where I live, nobody who's fourteen is having sex and doing major drugs. And I think if you see it in the movies, you may be influenced by it. I think it's so important to preserve your innocence.
author: Natalie Portman

quote: There are movies where we are interested in seeing people's lives without agreeing with what they're doing.
author: Natalie Portman

quote: I never gave up on country music because I knew what I was doing was not that bad.
author: Willie Nelson

quote: I'd like a male to listen to my music and find it kind of fascinating, what a girl goes through when they get heartbroken or get sad or get hurt by something.
author: Ellie Goulding

quote: A lot of country music is sad.
author: Willie Nelson

quote: I could always sing, from a really young age, but my voice was really weird. I used to make my mum turn up the radio every day in our house. She was well into music so I got that from her.
author: Ellie Goulding

quote: There's a great enthusiasm for good country music all over the world.
author: Willie Nelson

quote: I maintain that when I finally retire from my career in music, I will go and live back in Wales - when I am an old person, if I live to be an old person. The water I miss, and the air, there's something different about it. And I miss the simple life.
author: Ellie Goulding

quote: I think Ray Charles did as much as anybody when he did his country music album. Ray Charles broke down borders and showed the similarities between country music and R&ampB.
author: Willie Nelson

quote: I've always said that Adele has turned so many people on to British singers - whether female singers or just like music from this country in general.
author: Ellie Goulding

quote: We used to play music for fun. Much more than now. Now nobody picks up a guitar unless they're paid for it.
author: Leonard Cohen

quote: I'm obsessed with the countryside: woods, forests, fields, lakes, mountains. I'm really into folk music and folklore. But more so I'm into electronic music. I'm into bands that have both aspects, like Boards of Canada is a perfect example. You could listen to that type of music running through a woods. It's kind of what I wanted to achieve.
author: Ellie Goulding

quote: I need music. It's like my heartbeat, so to speak. It keeps me going no matter what's going on - bad games, press, whatever!
author: LeBron James

quote: I don't really have a style icon but I really admire the way people dress like Gaga, Rihanna and Gwen Stefani. It's good to be inspired by singers who write music and dress incredibly - rather than models and people in the fashion industry who dress immaculately anyway because it's their style.
author: Ellie Goulding

quote: It is so characteristic, that just when the mechanics of reproduction are so vastly improved, there are fewer and fewer people who know how the music should be played.
author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quote: I met Prince William at a musical festival and he let me know he was a fan of my music. But the invitation to sing at his wedding reception came completely out of the blue. The fact that Kate and William knew the words to my songs was very touching.
author: Ellie Goulding

quote: Pop changes week to week, month to month. But great music is like literature.
author: Ravi Shankar

quote: I started getting these attacks in 2009, just as my music career was taking off. I'd be doing photo-shoots and started to feel like I was having heart attacks. Increasingly I found it difficult to step outside my flat. Things started to get better after I saw a therapist, who told me I needed to make peace with my panic attacks.
author: Ellie Goulding

quote: I was always struck by how Picasso had no interest in music.
author: David Hockney

quote: I start really missing London when I go away. I have a little flat, but very central. I live above a pub and you'd think it'd be a nightmare, but I like hearing the music and it's quite comforting.
author: Ellie Goulding

quote: I am happy to make money. I want to make more money, make more music, eat Big Macs and drink Budweisers.
author: Kid Rock

quote: I didn't want to go out and change anything. I just wanted to make the music that was part of my background, which was rock and blues and hip-hop.
author: Kid Rock

quote: It didn't even occur to me that I'm the last person in the world who should play salsa or Brazilian music.
author: David Byrne

quote: You create a community with music, not just at concerts but by talking about it with your friends.
author: David Byrne

quote: I've noticed a lot of younger artists have less fear of doing different sorts of things, whether it's various types of music, or gallery artists moving between video and sculpture and drawing.
author: David Byrne

quote: The making of music is profoundly affected by the market.
author: David Byrne

quote: We don't make music - it makes us.
author: David Byrne

quote: People are already finding ways to make their music and play it in front of people and have a life in music, I guess, and I think that's pretty much all you can ask.
author: David Byrne

quote: Even from a listening end now, I'm still completely a fan of music.
author: James Iha

quote: I'm not suggesting people abandon musical instruments and start playing their cars and apartments, but I do think the reign of music as a commodity made only by professionals might be winding down.
author: David Byrne

quote: We tend to mistake music for the physical object.
author: David Byrne

quote: I've rarely seen video screens used well in a music concert.
author: David Byrne

quote: There's more good music being made now than ever before.
author: David Byrne

quote: Why not invest in the future of music, instead of building fortresses to preserve its past?
author: David Byrne

quote: The imminent demise of the large record companies as gatekeepers of the world's popular music is a good thing, for the most part.
author: David Byrne

quote: I think I'm a music fan before anything else.
author: Nuno Bettencourt

quote: So there's no guarantee if you like the music you will empathize with the culture and the people who made it. It doesn't necessarily happen. I think it can, but it doesn't necessarily happen. Which is kind of a shame.
author: David Byrne

quote: I supply the music for Vampires, which is a new series that's coming out.
author: John Entwistle

quote: If anything, a lot of electronic music is music that no one listens to at home, hardly. It's really only to be heard when everyone's out enjoying it.
author: David Byrne

quote: Ninety percent of all music is always crap, and when too many people decide they're going to have guitar bands, then ninety percent of them are going to be crap. It's just a given law.
author: David Byrne

quote: It seems almost backwards to me that my music seems the more emotional outlet, and the art stuff seems more about ideas.
author: David Byrne

quote: There's something about music that encourages people to want to know more about the person that made it, and where it was recorded, what year it was done, what they were listening to, and all this kind of stuff. There's something that invites all this obsessive behavior.
author: David Byrne

quote: Everything we release with Tool is inspired by our music.
author: Maynard James Keenan

quote: What I like about music is the songs you can remember the lines of in a single second.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: Music is part of the life of fashion, too.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: Singing is a way of releasing an emotion that you sometimes can't portray when you're acting. And music moves your soul, so music is the source of the most intense emotions you can feel.
author: Amanda Seyfried

quote: Remember the first time you went to a show and saw your favorite band. You wore their shirt, and sang every word. You didn't know anything about scene politics, haircuts, or what was cool. All you knew was that this music made you feel different from anyone you shared a locker with. Someone finally understood you. This is what music is about.
author: Gerard Way

quote: The only reason that you do visual is solely for the visual. That's the only reason. It doesn't sell your music for you.
author: Shania Twain

quote: Without a doubt, the best way to get to know me is through my music.
author: Shania Twain

quote: Country music is still your grandpa's music, but it's also your daughter's music. It's getting bigger and better all the time and I'm glad to be a part of it.
author: Shania Twain

quote: Music is a great natural high and a great natural escape.
author: Shania Twain

quote: Marilyn Monroe never sold a platinum album. And more people know my music than what I look like.
author: Shania Twain

quote: My music must reflect whatever's going on in my mind, and my life needs to evolve for me to discover who it is I'm becoming.
author: Shania Twain

quote: I have terrible hearing trouble. I have unwittingly helped to invent and refine a type of music that makes its principal proponents deaf.
author: Pete Townshend

quote: All my concerts had no sounds in them they were completely silent. People had to make up their own music in their minds!
author: Yoko Ono

quote: Beethoven can write music, thank God, but he can do nothing else on earth.
author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quote: I think people need to have fun with whatever they're doing - makeup, their clothes, music, live shows - anything you don't need to take too seriously, don't take too seriously.
author: Kesha

quote: Rock 'n' roll music is what gets me off.
author: Joan Jett

quote: When I listen to music, I don't want to hear about flowers. I like death and destruction.
author: Jonathan Davis

quote: Music is the career I'm lucky enough to get paid for, but I have other desires and passions.
author: Layne Staley

quote: I had spent many years pursuing excellence, because that is what classical music is all about... Now it was dedicated to freedom, and that was far more important.
author: Nina Simone

quote: The best music is essentially there to provide you something to face the world with.
author: Bruce Springsteen

quote: Music was invented to confirm human loneliness.
author: Lawrence Durrell

quote: Music never dies. Do we really need another Madonna tour? Does she have to compete with women performers 25 years her junior?
author: Camille Paglia

quote: Yet, it ought to be obvious that good music generally occupies a higher plane that mere politics. Great writers can express moods through melody and capture experiences we share most powerfully - love, lust, longing joy, rage, fear triumph, yearning and confusion.
author: Tony Snow

quote: Every so often, I feel I should graduate to classical music, properly. But the truth is, I'm more likely to listen to rock music.
author: Tony Blair

quote: Music is really something that makes people whole.
author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quote: I think the world is ready for some rock 'n' roll. Some real time guys that play their own instruments, write their own songs, and sing the music and have a good time doing it.
author: Vince Neil

quote: People are going deaf because music is played louder and louder, but because they're going deaf, it has to be played louder still.
author: Milan Kundera

quote: Do I listen to pop music because I'm miserable or am I miserable because listen to pop music?
author: John Cusack

quote: For me, music and life are all about style.
author: Miles Davis

quote: Music must take rank as the highest of the fine arts - as the one which, more than any other, ministers to the human spirit.
author: Herbert Spencer

quote: A lot of music is mathematics. It's balance.
author: Mel Brooks

quote: I think that a song, when it works, never mind a piece of long form music, even a song is something that speaks to itself but has a language all of its own, ideally.
author: Steve Hackett

quote: I'm not trying to clock scores in this lifetime, it's just that things are better now than they were like five, ten years ago. Music has gotten a lot better. There's a lot of people who are committed to - soulfully.
author: Jerry Garcia

quote: If not for music, I would probably be a very frustrated scientist. It's one way to answer the question, 'What is the meaning of life?' I feel music answers it better.
author: Paula Cole

quote: I listen to music for emotion and I get zero emotion from rap.
author: Sebastian Bach

quote: I just do what I do. I like to make music.
author: Neil Young

quote: I want my music to do the explaining.
author: Demi Lovato

quote: I was lucky enough to be the lady that was asked to be Maria in the Sound Of Music, and that film was fortunate enough to be huge hit. The same with Mary Poppins. I got terribly lucky in that respect.
author: Julie Andrews

quote: As a rule, my focus is on classical music, but I love jazz. I love everything, actually.
author: Julie Andrews

quote: Linguistic philosophers continue to argue that probably music is not a language, that is in the philosophical debate. Another point of view is to say that music is a very profound language.
author: Robert Fripp

quote: Getting into music has changed my personality and way of doing things. I'm far more open now.
author: Shaun White

quote: More than art, more than literature, music is universally accessible.
author: Billy Joel

quote: If you make music for the human needs you have within yourself, then you do it for all humans who need the same things. You enrich humanity with the profound expression of these feelings.
author: Billy Joel

quote: In America, life is introverted, self-absorbed - and so is their music.
author: Chris Barber

quote: For whatever reason, not all people are born with the particular gift of being able to express ourselves through music. And, believe me, it is a gift.
author: Billy Joel

quote: Country music is three chords and the truth.
author: Harlan Howard

quote: In the course of transferring all my CDs to my iPod, I have found myself wandering the musical hallways of my past and reacquainting myself with music I haven't listened to in years.
author: Susan Orlean

quote: Maybe someday you can accuse somebody of being a poseur by selling out and playing blues music, but that's just not going to happen in my lifetime.
author: John Mayer

quote: The bottom line is that musicians love to make music and always will.
author: Jennifer Lopez

quote: Nature's music is never over her silences are pauses, not conclusions.
author: Mary Webb

quote: In essence, String Theory describes space and time, matter and energy, gravity and light, indeed all of God's creation... as music.
author: Roy H. Williams

quote: There is still a future with music, because people want music.
author: Maynard James Keenan

quote: People who make music together cannot be enemies, at least while the music lasts.
author: Paul Hindemith

quote: I haven't heard any music on the BBC World Service in a long time. Maybe I'm listening at the wrong times. But not one single piece of music.
author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quote: Everything revolves around the music when it comes to Tool.
author: Maynard James Keenan

quote: After all, in today's music scene every band seems to steal from other bands.
author: Maynard James Keenan

quote: Music is my life, it is a reflection of what I go through.
author: Lenny Kravitz

quote: There's no religion but sex and music.
author: Sting

quote: I have a big problem with piped music. I like either silence or to listen to it properly.
author: Sting

quote: I see music as one language. If one musical form eats its own tail, it dies. So it needs to be a mongrel, it needs to be hybridised.
author: Sting

quote: I quit high school on my birthday. It was my senior year and I didn't see the point. This was 1962, and I was ready to make music.
author: Barry White

quote: I write the music, produce it and the band plays within the parameters that I set.
author: Sting

quote: I think no artist can claim to have any access to the truth, or an authentic version of an event. But obviously they have slightly better means at their disposal because they have their art to energize whatever it is they're trying to write about. They have music.
author: Thom Yorke

quote: We're musicians. We make music for a living. It's that simple. Nothing else matters.
author: Eddie Van Halen

quote: My horizon on humanity is enlarged by reading the writers of poems, seeing a painting, listening to some music, some opera, which has nothing at all to do with a volatile human condition or struggle or whatever. It enriches me as a human being.
author: Wole Soyinka

quote: When I grew up, what was interesting for me was that music was color and life was gray. So music for me has always been more than entertainment.
author: Pete Townshend

quote: Entertainment came out of this thing called a television, and it was gray. Most of the films that we saw at the cinema were black and white. It was a gray world. And music somehow was in color.
author: Pete Townshend

quote: I'm writing constantly about all my crazy experiences across the world, so I have a lot of music I've already written.
author: Kesha

quote: I think it's important for people who love music to retain physical CDs or even vinyl, because it sounds so great and so much warmer than music over the internet.
author: Norah Jones

quote: And you have a record company behind it, this is a key too, you need people to fight for your records, at least a little bit. So if you have a great song, it's catchy, and you've got a little bit of help, I think that's all you need. But there hasn't been that in music.
author: Joan Jett

quote: Def Leppard is obviously a different band that we are, but the music work well tighter. And the audiences seem work well together too. We are opening, but we're having a good time.
author: Joan Jett

quote: I like music that's more offensive. I like it to sound like nails on a blackboard, get me wild.
author: Iggy Pop

quote: I like to hang out with my friends. I love music. I like to go to the movies. I like to eat. I like to cook.
author: Joan Jett

quote: I plan to stay in music. I plan to keep making records.
author: Joan Jett

quote: I sure saw a lot of kids that I'm sure didn't know a lot about us, or we were definitely new to them. The kids who came up to me afterward, we'd talk about music, sign a lot of autographs. So I'm sure we made a lot of new fans.
author: Joan Jett

quote: I think what I'm going to do is get more balance in my life to still be able to go out and play the hard rock 'n' roll and do what I like to do in music.
author: Joan Jett

quote: So it was out of necessity that Blackheart was born. I think it's great that now, 25 years later, we're not only putting out our own music, but are able to put out music by other bands. That's really exciting for us.
author: Joan Jett

quote: I've done some acting and a lot of different things, but mostly it's the music.
author: Joan Jett

quote: Before I settled on music, I wanted to be an archaeologist, an astronaut, all sorts of really diverse things.
author: Joan Jett

quote: Australia is so cool that it's hard to even know where to start describing it. The beaches are beautiful so is the weather. Not too crowded. Great food, great music, really nice people. It must be a lot like Los Angeles was many years ago.
author: Mary-Kate Olsen

quote: Pop music is not a threatening style of music.
author: Joan Jett

quote: I know music is subjective.
author: Joan Jett

quote: Well, I'll tell you, I don't know how aware teenagers are of me. I think it really depends on the teenager and how well-versed in music they are and what kind of music they like.
author: Joan Jett

quote: The music industry can make you feel like a prostitute.
author: Jonathan Davis

quote: We're not trying to change the world just music.
author: Jonathan Davis

quote: I've been a fan of electronic music since the beginning.
author: Jonathan Davis

quote: It's really cool to see glowsticks at the show, to see dance music culture infiltrating and becoming one with the metal community.
author: Jonathan Davis

quote: It seems like a lot of music today is so churned out and simple.
author: Jonathan Davis

quote: Singing is just a feeling set to music.
author: Carrie Underwood

quote: The calm mind allows one to connect with the inner self, the Soul, the very source of our being. That's where the music lives. That's where my music comes from.
author: Clarence Clemons

quote: At home I'm just a guy who has interests that extend far beyond music.
author: Layne Staley

quote: I wanted to take up music, so my father bought me a blunt instrument. He told me to knock myself out.
author: Jay London

quote: Music is the language of the heart, and conservatives always screw it up.
author: Glenn Beck

quote: Music is about communication... it isn't just something that maybe physically sounds good or orally sounds interesting it's something far, far deeper than that.
author: Evelyn Glennie

quote: My husband is a composer, so he plays piano all the time and I sit there and clap telling my unborn child, 'Hear me clap, hear the music.' I know music, in general, is supposed to be good for babies to hear.
author: Danica McKellar

quote: Music has always been my protection against the world, from a very young age. I feel safe inside of a jam.
author: Trey Anastasio

quote: People think our music's very aggressive or angry or whatever, and it's just the opposite, really... I like laughing. And I like being really calm before a show, and smiley.
author: Serj Tankian

quote: I find Indian music very funky. I mean it's very soulful, with their own kind of blues. But it's the only other school on the planet that develops improvisation to the high degree that you find in jazz music. So we have a lot of common ground.
author: John McLaughlin

quote: Making an album should be an honest experience. It shouldn't be about trying to gauge where popular music is today it should be about artistic expression and putting down what you want to put down.
author: Scott Weiland

quote: I think ABBA have a pure joy to their music and that's what makes them extraordinary.
author: Bono

quote: Great classic music that I've been turned on to has not only inspired and influenced me, but it has had an effect on my songwriting.
author: Scott Weiland

quote: The great moments of rock 'n' roll were never off in some corner of the music world, in a self-constructed ghetto.
author: Bono

quote: Rock music is niche.
author: Bono

quote: If you pour some music on whatever's wrong, it'll sure help out.
author: Levon Helm

quote: In our music, in our everyday life, there are so many negative things. Why not have something positive and stamp it with blackness?
author: Jamie Foxx

quote: Music was your real passion, this thing you held dear even above family. It was this relationship that never betrayed you. Once it became your job - this thing that was highly visible, this thing that became about commerce - that's when you were holding onto music like it was a palm tree in a hurricane.
author: Eddie Vedder

quote: Pop music is aspirin and the blues are vitamins.
author: Peter Tork

quote: Music, at its essence, is what gives us memories. And the longer a song has existed in our lives, the more memories we have of it.
author: Stevie Wonder

quote: Those who decide to use leisure as a means of mental development, who love good music, good books, good pictures, good plays, good company, good conversation - what are they? They are the happiest people in the world.
author: William Lyon Phelps

quote: A lot of music you might listen to is pretty vapid, it doesn't always deal with our deeper issues. These are the things I'm interested in now, particularly at my age.
author: Annie Lennox

quote: I love to make music and stay grounded.
author: Annie Lennox

quote: I only want to make music because I have a passion for it.
author: Annie Lennox

quote: I always think I'm the Tom Cruise of music - a lot of success and fans, but no critics, darling.
author: Jon Bon Jovi

quote: Music is a part of my life all the time - on the plane, before matches, driving out to the court.
author: Maria Sharapova

quote: The basis of our partnership strategy and our partnership approach: We build the social technology. They provide the music.
author: Mark Zuckerberg

quote: Music is an agreeable harmony for the honor of God and the permissible delights of the soul.
author: Johann Sebastian Bach

quote: The music of Hendrix wakes people up to their possibilities. It's more than just dreaming about being a guitar hero.
author: Carlos Santana

quote: I don't like to be labeled, to be anything. I've made the mistake before myself of labeling my music, but it's counter-productive.
author: Neil Young

quote: I have so many opinions about everything it just comes out during my music. It's a battle for me. I try not to be preachy. That's a real danger.
author: Neil Young

quote: My music isn't anything but me. It has jazz in it, and rock'n'roll, and it has an urgency to it.
author: Neil Young

quote: The '60s was one of the first times the power of music was used by a generation to bind them together.
author: Neil Young

quote: The thing about my music is, there really is no point.
author: Neil Young

quote: Commitments are one of the worst things to have in the music business. They're very annoying.
author: Neil Young

quote: Music is part of us, and either ennobles or degrades our behavior.
author: Boethius

quote: Live music is better.
author: Neil Young

quote: All that stuff about heavy metal and hard rock, I don't subscribe to any of that. It's all just music. I mean, the heavy metal from the '70s sounds nothing like the stuff from the '80s, and that sounds nothing like the stuff from the '90s. Who's to say what is and isn't a certain type of music?
author: Neil Young

quote: It is jazz music that called me to be a musician and I have always sang the songs that moved me the most. Singers, like Frank Sinatra and myself, we interpret the songs that we like. Not unlike a Shakespearean actor that goes back to the greatest words ever written, we go back to the greatest songs.
author: Harry Connick, Jr.

quote: I used to go to Bourbon Street when I was a kid and there would be club after club after club of people who were around when the music started. I mean these are legendary, maybe not so well known, but legendary musicians.
author: Harry Connick, Jr.

quote: I've spent hours and hours doing research into Appalachian folk music. My grandfather was a fiddler. There is something very immediate, very simple and emotional, about that music.
author: Renee Fleming

quote: I don't play pyrotechnic scales. I play about frustration, patience, anger. Music is an extension of my soul.
author: Dick Dale

quote: Music my rampart, and my only one.
author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quote: Though everything else may appear shallow and repulsive, even the smallest task in music is so absorbing, and carries us so far away from town, country, earth, and all worldly things, that it is truly a blessed gift of God.
author: Felix Mendelssohn

quote: I write the vocals last, because I wanted to invent the music first and push the music to the level that I had to compete against it.
author: Axl Rose

quote: Alas! all music jars when the soul's out of tune.
author: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: They teach you there's a boundary line to music. But, man, there's no boundary line to art.
author: Charlie Parker

quote: Soul music is timeless.
author: Alicia Keys

quote: When I was a young musician, the only option available to pursue secondary education in music was to attend a classical conservatory.
author: Billy Joel

quote: When I look at great works of art or listen to inspired music, I sense intimate portraits of the specific times in which they were created.
author: Billy Joel

quote: We are living in a time when American popular music is finally being recognized as one of our most successful exports. The demand is huge.
author: Billy Joel

quote: Most people are satisfied with the junk food being sold as music.
author: Billy Joel

quote: I'm probably writing music now for the same reason as I started writing songs when I was 14 - to meet women.
author: Billy Joel

quote: I can't think of one person I've ever met who didn't like some type of music.
author: Billy Joel

quote: Don't make music for some vast, unseen audience or market or ratings share or even for something as tangible as money. Though it's crucial to make a living, that shouldn't be your inspiration. Do it for yourself.
author: Billy Joel

quote: There's a constantly applicable nature to soul music, whereas sometimes pop music can be a periodical.
author: John Mayer

quote: I don't need my phone to play me music. I need it to be a phone and an e-mail thing.
author: David Duchovny
